text: A Zezi Krista, a Daviid biiga, a Abraam biiga roog sebre. 2A Abraam n doga Izaak. A Izaak n doga Zakoob, a Zakoob n doga Zɩɩda ne a yaopa, 3a Zɩɩda n dog a Fares ne a Zara, tɩ b ma yaa Tamar, a Fares n dog a Esrom, a Esrom n dog a Aram, 4a Aram n doga Aminadab, a Aminadab n dog a Naason, a Naason n dog a Salmon, 5a Salmon n dog a Booz, a ma la a Raab, a Booz n dog a Zobɛɛd, a ma la a Rut, a Zobɛɛd n dog a Zese, 6a Zese n dog dĩm a Daviid.

A Daviid n dog a Salomo, a ma a Uri paga, 7a Salomo n dog a Roboam, a Roboam n dog a Abia, a Abia n dog a Asa, 8a Asa n dog a Zozafat, a Zozafat n dog a Zoram, a Zoram n dog a Oziyas, 9a Oziyas n dog a Zoatam, a Zoatam n dog a Akaz, a Akaz n dog a Ezekiyas, 10A Ezekiyas n dog a Manase, a Manase n dog a Amon, a Amon n dog a Zoziyas, 11 a Zoziyas n dog a Zekoniyas ne a yaopa. Bãmb wakatẽ la b vʋk Israyɛl kamb n kẽng Babilon.

Babilon yembd poore, a Zekoniyas n dog a Salatiyɛl, a Salatiyɛl n dog a Zorobabɛl, 13a Zorobabel n dog a Abiud, a Abiud n dog a Eliakim, a Eliakim n dog a Azor, 14a Azor n dog a Sadok, a Sadok n dog a Akim, a Akim n dog a Eliyud, 15a Eliud n doga Eleazar, a Eleazar n dog a Matan, a Matan n dog a Zakoob, 16a Zakoob n dog a Zozɛf, a Maryam sɩda la a Maryam n dog a Zezi, sẽn boond tɩ Krista.
Dẽnna yaab rãmba ne b rot sõta woto: a Abraam n taa Daviid, yaa rot piig la a naase. A Daviid n ta Babilon yembdo, yaa rot piig la a naase. Babilon yembdo n ta Krista yaa rot piig la a naase.

A Zezi Krista dogma kibar la woto: a ma, a Maryam, da ya a Zozɛf pʋg-bila. La a Maryam sẽn waa n nan ka kul a Zozɛf, a mikame, tɩ ne a Vʋʋsem Sõng raabo, a lebga zɩsgo. 19A sɩda, a Zozɛf, sẽn da ya nin-tɩrgã, pa tʋlg n gom tɩ yi yɩng ye a tʋlgame bal n soos n bas a Maryam. 20La rẽ sẽn waa n be a yamẽ, la a sẽn yãe Soaala malɛk a zãmsdẽ, sẽn yeel-a: «Zozɛf, Daviid biiga, da zoe rabeem n deeg f pʋg-bila, a Maryam, f zakẽ ye, tɩ biig ning sẽn sig a pʋgẽ wã yita a Vʋʋsem Sõng nengẽ.

Bi-ribl la a na n doge la f na n pʋda a yʋʋr a Zezi: tɩ yaa yẽ n na n sɩd yiis a buuda neba yel-wẽnd pʋgẽ.» 22La yella yɩɩ woto, n taas Soaala sẽn da togs ne bãngdba noore: 23 Pa-kul na n dɩka pʋga n dog biiga, la b na n pʋda a biigã tɩ Emmanwɛl, dat n yeelame tɩ Wẽnd bee d sʋka. 24A Zozɛf sẽn neke, a maana wala malɛka sẽn wilgi, a peega a paga, a zakẽ, 25 la a tol n doga a biigã tɩ b pa bãng taab ye; la a Zozɛf pʋda biiga yʋʋr a Zezi.

A Zezi doga Bɛtelyɛɛm, Zɩɩde tẽnga, dĩm a Erod naamẽ, la ade, neb sẽn bʋgd ãds yii yaanga n wa Zerizalɛɛm 2n sok woto: «Zʋɩf rãmb dĩma sẽn dog paalma bee yɛ? Tõnd yãenda b ãdg sẽn puki tɩ d wa n na n waoog-ba.» 3B sẽn wʋm dẽ, dĩm a Erod ne Zerizalɛɛm tõre yɛɛsame. 4Dĩma tigma maan-kʋʋdba kãsem dãmba ne sẽn karem-ba n sikã la a sok-b lame n bãng Wẽnd Nedã sẽn na n dog zĩig ninga. 5«Yaa Bɛtelyɛɛm, Zɩɩde tẽnga, tɩ bãngda gʋlsame:
Zɩɩda tẽn-peelmẽ Bɛtelyɛɛm, ka foo la tẽn-bil Zɩɩda ye, tɩ dĩm ning sẽn na n gũ m buuda Israyɛl, na n yila f pʋgẽ.»

A Erod soos n boola ãdsa bagbã n na n bãng wakat bʋg taki la ãdga puk-ba, 8la a tees-b la Bɛtelyɛɛm sore n yetẽ: «Kẽng-y n tɩ sok-y biiga yelle, la y sã n bãng vẽenega, bɩ y lɛɛg n wa togs-ma tɩ m me kẽng n tɩ waoog-a.» 9Ãdsa bagba sẽn paam dĩma koɛɛga, b rɩka sore; b le yãee ãdgã t'a kẽnd b taoore la a waa n tɩ yalsa sus biiga sẽn da be zĩig ningã. 10B sẽn yãe ãdgã b sũur yɩɩ noog wʋsgo.

B kẽe roogã n yãend biiga ne b ma, a Maryam, la b wõgemdame n waoog-ba; b pagsa b kogendo n yiis b kũuni n kõ-ba: sãnem, tɩdare, ne tɩ-kaam sẽn tar yũ-noogo. 12Dẽ poore b bãnga b zãmsdẽ tɩ b ka tõe n leb n tũ a Erod nengẽ ye, la b bao sor a to n leb b tẽngẽ.

Bãmb loogr poore, Soaala malɛk lika a Zozɛf a gũeemẽ n yeel-a: «Yik n dɩk biiga ne a ma n zoe n kẽng Ezipt tẽnga la f pa be n ta wakat ning m sẽn na n wilg fu; a Erod na n baoo biigã n kʋ.» 14A Zozɛf yika ne yʋngo n dɩk biiga ne a ma n zoe n kẽng Ezipt tẽnga, 15 la a paa be n tãag a Erod kaalem. Woto la Soaala koɛɛg tõog n taase: M boola m biiga Ezipt tẽnga.

A Erod sẽn mik tɩ bagba belg-a lame, a sũur puuga al wʋsgo, dẽ la a tʋm tɩ b kẽng Bɛtelyɛɛm la Bɛtelyɛɛm weoogo n kʋ kamb niyns fãa yʋʋm sẽn pa yɩɩd a yiibu, wala neba sẽn da mak n wilgã. 17La woto yɩɩ bãngd a Zeremi koɛɛg taasgo: 18  Kɛleng n kelem Rama yãbr la waasgo n waas be: ya a Rasɛl n yãbd a kamba la a tõt belegre tɩ b le ka ket ye.

La a Erod kũum poore, Soaala malɛk lika a Zozɛf a gõeemẽ, Ezipt tẽnga, 20n yeel-a: «Yik n dɩk biiga ne a ma n leb Israyɛl tẽnga tɩ sẽn da baood-b biigã n na n kʋ wã fãa kiime.» 21A Zozɛf yikame n dɩk biiga ne a ma n leb Israyɛl tẽnga. 22A sẽn wʋm t'a Arkelawus n dɩt naam Zɩɩda tẽn-peelmẽ, a ba, a Erod, zĩigẽ, a Zozɛf zoe rabeem ne be lebre, la a sẽn paam koɛɛg a zãmsdẽ, a zãagame n tees Galile baobgo, 23 a waa n kẽe tẽng a ye sẽn boond tɩ Nazarɛt. Woto me la bãngda koɛɛg tõog n taase: B na n bool-a lame tɩ Nazarɛt daoa.

Rao n da kõt soobo, a yʋʋr a Zã; a waa n bee Zɩɩda weoogẽ n karemd neba 2 n yetẽ: «Tuub-y y yel-wẽna tɩ Wẽnd Rĩung kolgame.» 3 Ad-y yaa yẽ yell la bãngd a Izai da gomda: Sẽn moond-a weoogẽ wã koɛɛg la woto: segl-y Soaala sor, kɩt-y tɩ b so-bugsa lebg tɩrse.

A Zã ra yera fuug sẽn wʋg ne yʋgem kõbdo la a ra sẽga gãndo. A rɩɩb da yaa sʋya la weoog sɩɩdo. 5Zerizalɛɛm ne Zɩɩda la Zʋrdẽ baobga rãmb fãa gill da kẽnda a nengẽ. 6B ra togsda b yel-wẽna n deegd soobo, Zʋrdẽ koomẽ. 7 A Zã sẽn yãend Farizẽ la Saduseẽ rãmba tɩ b wat wʋsgo n na n deeg soobo, a yeel-b lame: «Wag-bi buudu, ãnda n wilg yãmb tɩ y zoe n põs Wẽnd beem sẽn wat y zutu? 8Bɩ y tʋm tʋʋm sõma n wilg tɩ y teema zʋgo, 9 la y ra saag n yeel y sũurẽ: ‹Tõnd yaa a Abraam kamb ye.›

M yet-y lame tɩ kuga sẽn dɩgã, Wẽnd tõe n yiisa a Abraam kamb b pʋsẽ. 10 Lar zoe n dɩga tɩɩga sɛɛga; tɩɩg ninga fãa sẽn pa womda bi-sõma, b na n kɛɛg-a lame n yõog bugum. 11Mam yẽ kõt-y la soob koomẽ y zʋg tekr yĩnga la mam sẽn deng a soab taoorã yɩɩda maam; paam n lodg a neodr gĩs menga looga maam; yẽ na n soo yãmb ne a Vʋʋsem Sõng la bugum. 12A zãada kaorg a nugẽ n na n yelg a kood zɛɛgẽ; ka-bɛɛla na n suii baoorẽ, la fɩɩba na n yõoga bugum ning sẽn ka kiida pʋgẽ.»

A Zezi yii Galile n wa Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlga, a Zã nengẽ, n na n deeg soobo. 14A Zã ra pa rat n sak ye, n yetẽ: «Yaa maam n tog n deeg soob yãmb nengẽ, tɩ yãmb baas n wat mam nengẽ!» 15A Zezi leok-a lame: «Bas tɩ m maan woto nanda tɩ yaa woto la d tog maan tɩ fãa zemse.» T'a Zã yaool n na n sak. 16A Zezi sẽn deeg soob n yit koomẽ, la saaga pilg a gãongo, la b yãee a Vʋʋsem Sõng sẽn sigd a Zezi zugu wa walle, 17 la koɛɛg me n sãd yĩngri: «Ada yaa mam bi-nongre, mam yam kẽe-a la zãnga!»

A Vʋʋsem Sõng talla a Zezi n kẽ we-raoogẽ tɩ Sʋtãan kʋɩɩb-ba. 2B maana rasem pisnaase la yʋnd pisnaase n ka rɩ, n ka yũ ye. 3Dẽ la kʋɩɩbda kolg n yeele: «Fo sã n ya Wẽnd Biiga bɩ f kɩt tɩ kug kãensa lebg buri.» 4 A Zezi leok-a lame: «B gʋlsame: Ninsaal ka rɩlgd a meng ne bur bal ye, yaa ne koɛɛg ning fãa sẽn yit Wẽnnaam noorẽ.» 5La Sʋtãan tall-b lame n kẽ Zerizalɛɛm n dʋʋs-b wẽnd dooga zugu, 6 n yeel-ba: «Fo sã n ya Wẽnd Biiga bɩ f yɩk n tiimd tẽnga, tɩ b gʋlsame:

B na n kõ-la b malɛgsa noore tɩ b põk foom b nugẽ tɩ f naoor da sɩɩs kugr ye.» 7  A Zezi leok-a Sʋtaana: «B le gʋlsame: Da kʋɩɩb Wẽnnaam, f Soaala ye.» 8Sʋtãan tall-b lame n dʋ tãn wok zugu n wilg-b dũni wã ne a zɩɩri, 9n yeel-ba: «M na n kõ-f la woto fãa, f sã n wõgemd m taoore n waoog maam.» 10 Dẽ la a Zezi yeel-a: «Looge, Sʋtãana! Tɩ b gʋlsame:
Wẽnnaam, f Soaala, bal taoore la f na n wõgemd Bãmb bal la f na n waooge.» 11Sʋtãan bas-b lame n looge tɩ malɛgsa kolg n na n ges b yelle.

A Zezi sẽn wʋm tɩ b yõka a Zã, b leba Galile. 13 B yii Nazarɛt tẽnga n wa kẽed Kafarnaom, Tiberiyad mogr noore, Zabulõ la Neftali satmẽ. 14Woto la bãngda Izayi toagsga taasyã: 15Zabulõ tẽnga, Neftali tẽnga, mogr sorẽ dãmba, Zʋrdẽ rʋʋnd dãmba, Galile bu-zẽmb rãmba! 16  Baad-y likẽ dãmba yãee vẽenem kãsenga, vẽenem n bui lik la kũum sẽn da reeg tẽns niyns n yãmbã.
A Zezi sɩnga marsã n karemd neba n yetẽ: «Teem-y zʋgo tɩ Arzãn Rĩung kolgame.»

A Zezi waa n looda Galile mogra noore, n yãe ned ne a yao: a Simo, b sẽn boond a soab t'a Piyɛr, ne a Andre, a ba-biiga; b ra lobda b zulumsi tɩ b da yaa zĩm yõgdba. 19B yeel-b lame: «Pʋg-y maam tɩ m na sõng-y tɩ y paam ninsaalba.» 20La bãmb wẽneg n basa b zulumsa be n pʋg a Zezi. 21B sẽn ta taoore, b le yãee ned a to ne a yao, a Zak la a Zã, a Zebede kamba, tɩ b be koglg pʋgẽ ne b ba, n manegd b zulumsi; 22b bool-b lame. Bãmb me basa b ba la b zulumsi n pʋg a Zezi.

A Zezi ra saada Galile tẽnse n maand karengo pʋʋsg rotẽ, n wilgd Wẽnd Rĩung Kibar noogã, la b sãoogd bãas la pa-keem buud fãa. 24B yʋʋr yiime n ta Siri zamaana; tẽng fãa ra wata ne b nimbãan dãmba la b bãad dãmb buud toɛ toɛyã, wala sẽn yikd-b kisenkiiri, zut sẽn lebg rãmba, nao sẽn ki rãmba. B ra wata ne-ba t'a Zezi sãoog ba. 25Sɩd yɩɩ zãma kãseng n sɩng b pʋgbo; neb sẽn yit Galile la Tẽns piig sẽn tot taaba, n yit Zerizalɛɛm la Zɩɩda la Zʋrdẽ rʋʋnde.

A Zezi sẽn yãe zãma wã, b rʋʋ tãnga zugu. B zĩndame tɩ b karen-biisa na n kolg-ba. 2A Zezi kõ-b la koɛɛga n yetẽ: 3«Sũ-noog rãmba la sẽn teeg-b Wẽnd bala tɩ Wẽnnaam Rĩunga yaa bãmb soolem. 4  Sũ-noog rãmba la nin-bʋgse tɩ tẽnga na n yɩɩ bãmb soolem. 5  Sũ-noog rãmba la sũ-beed sẽn tar b rãmba, tɩ b na n paama belgda. 6  Sũ-noog rãmb la sẽn yãbd-b sõmblem kom la ko-yũudu, tɩ b na n tɩgame.

Sũ-noog rãmb la sẽn zoet-b b taab nimbãanega, tɩ b na n zoee bãmb me nimbãanega. 8  Sũ-noog rãmb la pʋ-peelem dãmba tɩ b na n yãee Wẽnnaam. 9Sũ-noog rãmb la sẽn mi-b sugri, tɩ b na n boola bãmb tɩ Wẽnd kamba. 10  Sũ-noog rãmba la sẽn sakd-b namsgo b tʋʋm sõma yĩnga, tɩ Wẽnd Rĩunga yaa bãmb soolem. 11  Yãmb la sũ-noog rãmba b sã n wa tʋʋsd-y la b namsd-y la b rõt-y rõadg buud fãa mam tũudma yĩnga.
Noog-y y sũuri la y kɩdem tɩ y pʋɩɩr na n yɩɩ kãseng arzãna. Ad-y yɩɩ boto la bãngdba nams pĩnda.

Yãmb yaa mooga yamsem. Yamsem sã n sãbge, bõe n tõe n le wa ne a noosem? A ka le be yõod ye la a sẽn tog yaa b lob-a yɩnga tɩ neb tabe. 14  Yãmb yaa dũni vẽenem; tẽng sẽn zao tãng zug ka tõe n solg a meng ye. 15 Fitil ka widigdi n dɩk koglg n lill-a ye, b ningd-a la zĩig ninga a sẽn na n tõog n kõ zaka rãmb vẽenem. 16 Woto me yãmb vẽenema tog n yãga y taab nini tɩ b yãe y tʋʋm sõma n tõog n pẽg y Ba sẽn be arzãna. 17Da ning-y y yamẽ tɩ m waame n na n sɛɛs Noora ne bãngdbã sẽn wilga ye; m waame n na n maneg n baase. 18

Sɩd-sɩda m yet-y lame tɩ gomde, gomd pɛdg meng kõn zĩnd Wẽnnaam noora pʋgẽ n pa taase tɩ saaga la tẽnga ket n be b zĩigẽ ye. 19Dɩlla ned ning fãa sẽn na n tõdg-a, ba noor sẽn ya bilfu, Wẽnnaam noya sʋka la a wilg a taab tɩ b tõdg wa yẽnda, b na ges yẽ soab me wa nin-bila, Wẽnd Rĩunga pʋgẽ. Ned ninga sẽn na n deeg-ba la a zãms a taab tɩ b maan wa yẽ, b na ges yẽ soab wa nin-kãsenga Wẽnnaam Rĩunga pʋgẽ.

Fo sã n seg f zabd-n-taaga, bɩ f ning pãng tɩ y zems taaba sora zugu, sã n ka rẽ a wat n bool-f la bʋʋdo tɩ bʋʋda soab paalg-f ne gũudã, tɩ gũuda yõk fo n pag roogo. 26Sɩd-sɩda, mam yet-f lame tɩ f kõn tõog n yi roogã, samd pɛdg meng sã n ket f zug ye.

Yãmb wʋmame tɩ b yeelame: Da ro f to pag ye. 28La mam yet-y lame: Ned ninga sẽn gesa a to pag ne raabo, a soab zoe n yoo ne-a a sũurẽ. 29 F rɩtg nif sã n kʋɩɩbd-fo, bɩ f kɩdg-a n lob yɩɩga; fo yĩnga wilg a ye bõne, são yĩnga tõr sẽn na n lob bugmẽ. 30 F nug rɩtg sã n kʋɩɩbd-fo, bɩ f kʋʋg-a n lob yɩɩga; fo yĩnga wilg a ye bõne, são yĩnga tõr sẽn na n lʋɩ bugmẽ.

B yeelame yɛsa: Ned ninga sẽn yiisa pag tog n kõ-a-la a rigb sebre. 32 Mam yet-y lame tɩ sã n ka pagã n bao ned a to, ned ninga sẽn yiis-a wã wilgd-a-la yoob sore. Ned ninga me sẽn na n dɩk pʋg kãnga, yaa yoob la a maanda. 33  Yãmb le wʋma b sẽn yeel pĩnd dãmbã: Da sãam f pʋlong ye, la pids kãabg ning fãa f sẽn kãab Soaalã. 34 Mam yet-y lame: da wẽen ba bilfu, da wẽen ne yĩngr tɩ yaa Wẽnd zaoore.

Da wẽen ne tẽnga tɩ yaa Wẽnd nao palgr zĩiga. Da wẽen ne Zerizalɛɛm tɩ yaa Na-kãseng tẽnga. 36Da wẽen ne f zugu tɩ f ka tõe tɩ f zoobg a ye pelg bɩ sob ye. 37Y sã n tog n leok tɩ N-yẽe! Bɩ y leok tɩ N-yẽe! Sã n tog n leok tɩ Ayoo! Bɩ yɩ Ayoo! Sẽn zʋʋg rẽ yita yam-beeda soab nengẽ.

Da wẽen ne tẽnga tɩ yaa Wẽnd nao palgr zĩiga. Da wẽen ne Zerizalɛɛm tɩ yaa Na-kãseng tẽnga. 36Da wẽen ne f zugu tɩ f ka tõe tɩ f zoobg a ye pelg bɩ sob ye. 37Y sã n tog n leok tɩ N-yẽe! Bɩ y leok tɩ N-yẽe! Sã n tog n leok tɩ Ayoo! Bɩ yɩ Ayoo! Sẽn zʋʋg rẽ yita yam-beeda soab nengẽ.

Yãmb wʋmame tɩ b yeela pĩnda: Nong f zoa la f kisg f bɛyã. 44Mam yet-y lame: nong-y y bɛɛba la pʋʋs-y sẽn namsd-b yãmba yĩnga. 45Woto yãmb na n yɩɩ Ba ning sẽn be-a arzãna kamba, tɩ b basda b wĩndg t'a pukd nin-sõma la nin-wẽnse, la b basda b saaga t'a niid nin-sõma la nin-wẽns yĩnga. 46Yãmb sã n nong sẽn nong-b yãmb bala, bõe rolb la y na n le gũ yɛsa? Sẽn deesd-b fadga ka maan dẽ sɩda? 47Yãmb sã n pʋʋsd y saam-biisa bala, bõe la toogo, bu-zẽmba ka maand boto sɩda? 48 Yãmb me modg n yɩ sõma wa y yĩngr Ba wã sẽn ya sõmb zãngã.

Gũus-y n da maan y tʋʋm sõma neb a taaba taoore nagr yĩng bal ye. Ka rẽ y kõn paam dolbo y Ba sẽn be arzãna nengẽ ye. 2Fo sã n na n yols ned nimbãanega bɩ f ra yi n moon yɩnga wa ninsaan-kazukem kẽere sẽn maand pʋʋsg rotẽ la sotiisẽ n baood neb pẽgr ye, tɩ m togsd-y la vẽenega, bãmb dãmb zoe n paama b rolbo. 3Fo sã n dat n yols ned nimbãanega bɩ f ra sak tɩ f goabg bãng f rɩtg sẽn maand bũmb ning ye. 4Woto ned kõn bãng fo sẽn maan-a ye la f Ba Sõng sẽn ne likẽ wã na rol-fo.

Y sã pʋʋsdẽ bɩ y ra maan wa zãmb rãmba sẽn maanda ye; bãmb sã n na n pʋʋse, b baooda zĩig ning neb wʋsg sẽn tõe n yãend-ba, pʋʋsg roto la sobadse. M yet-y lame tɩ b zoe n paama b rolbo. 6Fo sã n pʋʋsdẽ bɩ f kẽ f roogẽ n lɛɛg n pag f kʋɩlenga la f pʋʋs f Ba, lillẽ, tɩ f Ba sẽn ne likẽ wã na rol-fo. 7Y pʋʋsg pʋgẽ bɩ y ra baam wala bu-zẽmba ye; b tẽedame tɩ b sã n gomd n pa yɛɛdẽ la Wẽnd kelgd b pʋʋsgo. 8Da maan-y wa bãmb bada, tɩ y Ba zoe n mii y sẽn tar bũmb ning tʋʋmde tɩ y nan ka yaag y noor ye. 9Dẽ yĩngã pʋʋs-y woto:

‹Tõnd Ba sẽn be arzãnẽ, y yʋʋr paam pẽgre, 10tɩ y Rĩung yalse, tɩ b maan y yam tẽng zug, wẽnd b sẽn maand arzãna. 11Kõ-y tõnd dũnna d beoog-beoog fãa rɩɩbo. 12Kõ-y tõnd d yel-wẽna sugri wẽnd d sẽn kõt d taab sugri, 13la y ra bas tɩ d lʋɩ kʋɩɩbg pʋgẽ ye la y fãgd-d wẽnem soaba nugẽ.›
N-ye! Yãmb sã n kõ y taab sugri, y Ba sẽn be arzãna me na kõ yãmb sugri. 15 La yãmb sã n pa kõ y taab sugri, y Ba wã me kõn bas-y taal ye.

Y sã n loet y noor bɩ y ra gãnem y neng wa zãmb rãmba sẽn maanda ye; b takda b nenga tɩ neba tõog n yãe tɩ b sɩd maanda no-loeere. M yet-y lame tɩ b zoe n paama b rolbo. 17Fo sã n loet f noore bɩ f zɛ f zug kaam la f pek f nenga, 18woto ned kõn bãng tɩ f loee noore sã n ka f Ba wã bal sẽn yɛs lillẽ wã, la bãmb sẽn ne likẽ wã na rol-fo.

Tẽng zug ka, bɩ y ra tigs arzɛk ye tɩ bugd la zũnzũur dɩtame, tɩ wagdb pood roto n zuuda. 20Tigs-y y arzɛka arzãnẽ, tɩ be, bugd la zũnzũur ka n dɩtẽ ye la wagdb me ka pood n zuud ye. 21F arzɛk sẽn be zĩig ninga, be me la f sũura na n zĩndi.
Nif la yĩnga fitila. Fo nif sã n ya sõmbo, fo yĩnga fãa bee vẽenemẽ. 23La f nif sã n sãame, f yĩnga zãng bee likẽ. Fo vẽenem sã n lebg lika, fo lik yɩta a wãna?
Ned ka tõe n maan zu-soaben-dãmb a yiib raab ye, f na kisga a ye, n nong a ye, f na n basa a ye n tũ a ye. Yãmb me ka tõe n pʋg Wẽnnaam la y pʋg Ligd ye.

Yaa rẽ yĩng la m yet-y: da bʋ-y y vɩɩma poorẽ, n sokd-y y sẽn na n dɩ bũmb ning ye; la y ra bʋ y yĩnga poorẽ n sokd-y y sẽn na n yeelg fuug ning ye. Vɩɩma ka yɩɩd dɩɩbo la yĩnga ka são fuugu? 26Ges-y luiili sẽn yɩgd yĩngri: b ka bʋte, b ka kẽebde, b ka suiid baoorẽ ye, la y Ba sẽn be arzãna dɩlgd-b lame. Yãmb pa yɩɩd bãmb sɩda? 27Yãmb sʋka ãnda n tõe n zĩnd n bʋ n paas a vɩɩma woglem kãntɩɩg a ye? 28La fut poorẽ, bõe yĩng la y na n bʋ?
Da sũk-y beoog poorẽ tɩ beoog na baoo a rẽnna. Daar fãa ne a zɩɩbo, sekd-a lame.

Da kao-y y taab bʋʋdo tɩ b kõn kao y me bʋʋd ye. 2 Y sẽn kaood y taab bʋʋda toto, boto me la b na n kao yãmb bʋʋdo. Makr ning y sẽn makd n kõt y taaba, makr kãng me n yɩt yãmb dẽnna. 3Bõe tɩ f get mooga sẽn be f to nifẽ? Fo yaool n ka ne ra-giiga sẽn be f nifẽ ye. 4Fo na n yɩɩ wãna n yeel f to: ‹Yaas tɩ m yiis moogo f nifẽ,› tɩ ra-giig yaool n be f rẽnnẽ? 5Zãmb soaba, deng n yiis ra-giiga f nifẽ tɩ f na tõog marsã n yãe moogã n yãk f to nifẽ.
Da rɩk-y maand nemd n kõ baag ye, da rɩk-y kĩndfu n lob kurkuy taoor ye: b wat n tab-a lame n yaool n lɛɛg n kẽ yãmba, n na n wãb yãmb.

Kos-y tɩ b na kõ-y, bao-y tɩ y na yãe. Kabs-y tɩ b na pak tɩ y kẽ. 8Sẽn kota n paamde, sẽn baooda n yãete, sẽn kabsda la b pakda. 9Yãmb sʋka ãnd n be t'a biig sã n kos-a buri bɩ a kõ-a kugri? 10Ka rɩll bɩ a kos-a kʋɩl-zẽoogo t'a kõ-a waafo? 11Dɩlla yãmb ne y wẽnema, y sã n mii y kamb bõn-sõma kũuni, bãng-y tɩ Ba Sõng na maan neere n yɩɩd ne neb niyns sẽn bõsd-b bãmba. 12  Yãmb sẽn dat tɩ y taab maan bũmb ninga y yĩnga, bɩ y maan boto ne y taaba: dẽ n be Noora sebrẽ la bãngdba me rẽnnẽ.

Ka sẽn boond-a maam: ‹Soaala, Soaala,› n kẽed arzãn ye, yaa sẽn maand-a m Ba sẽn be arzãna yamleoogo. 22Wʋsg wat n yeela maam daar a ye: ‹Soaala, Soaala, tũu ne yãmb maasem tɩ d paam n wilg sẽn na n yaool n wa, la d dig sʋtãamba, la d maan bõn-bãna.› 23 La m kõn zoe b nif n leok-b ye: ‹Mam zɩ n bãng yãmb ye, yi-y m taoore, tʋʋm yood dãmba!› 24Ned ninga sẽn na n kelg goam niyns m sẽn togs mars marsã la a maand boto, m tõe n mak-a la ne sɩlem soaba sẽn me a roog kugr kegemd zugu.

Saag niime, koom fõdame, sob-raoog yikame tɩ b fãa tãag-a la a pa lʋɩ ye, b sẽn me-a kugra zug yĩnga. 26Ned ning me sẽn wʋmd-a mam koɛɛga la a pa maand wa m sẽn datã, b tõe n maka yẽ soab ne gãeenga sẽn me a roog bĩsr zugu. 27Saag niime, koom waa ne pãnga, sob-raoog yikame tɩ b tãag-a la a lʋɩɩme la a wãab ka yɩ bilfr ye!» 28A Zezi sẽn gom n sɛ, la zãma wã sẽn wẽ siri b karenga poorẽ; sɩda a Zezi pa gomd wa sẽn karen-ba-n-sika ye, 29 b gomda wa naab sẽn gomd ne a soolem dãmba.

A Zezi siga tãngã tɩ neb wʋsg sɩng b pʋgbo. 2Yĩng soab a ye n waa n wõgemd b taoore n yeel-ba: «Yãmb sã n dat waa, m Soaala, y tõe n sãoog-m lame.» 3B tẽega b nus n sɩɩs-a n yetẽ: «Sãoog tɩ m nonga rẽ.» Wakat kãng bala a yĩnga yɩlgame. 4 T'a Zezi na n yeel-a: «Sõng n da gom tɩ neb wʋm ye, kẽng tɩ maan-kʋʋda yãend-fo la f kɩs kũun ning a Moyiiz sẽn yet tɩ b kɩs a soaba tɩ yɩ f sãoogr kaseto.»

B sẽn kẽ Kafarnaom tẽnga la tãnsoab a ye sẽn bʋʋg-ba n na n kos-b bũmbu. A yeelame: 6«Soaala, m dakõor n gãe yiri, a nus la a nao kiime la a namsda wʋsgo.» 7A Zezi yeel-a lame: «M na kẽng n tɩ sãoog-a!» 8Tãnsoaba leokame: «Soaala, m zema bõe tɩ y na n kẽ m zakẽ? Yeel-y gomd a ye bala tɩ m dakõora na sãooge. 9Ade, maam ne m sẽn pa na-kãsengã, m soo tãb-biisi, m sã n yeel a ye: kẽnge! A kẽngdame, m sã n yeel a to: wa! A watame; m sã n yeel m dakõorã: maan woto! A maandame.» 10A Zezi wʋma gomdã la kẽ-la b sũurẽ tɩ b yeel b poorẽ dãmba:

«Mam yeta yãmba, m pa yãend tẽeb a woto buud Israyɛl kamb sʋk ye. Wʋsg na n yii yaanga la taoore n wa paam tɩgra roog n kẽ ne a Abraam, a Izaak la a Zakoob arzãn Rĩung pʋgẽ, 12 tɩ Rĩunga kamb mens na n yaool n pa yɩnga, likẽ, n yãbd tɩ b yẽn kẽrsdẽ.» 13B yaool n yeela tãnsoabã: «Dɩk f sore, la Wẽnd na kõ foom f sẽn tẽede.» Wakat kãng bala dakõora paama laafi.

A Zezi sẽn kẽ a Piyɛr zakẽ, a mikame tɩ yẽ reem-poak gãeeme n pa keemẽ. 15B sɩɩsa reem-poaka nug la a sãoogame la a yikame n segl-ba. Zĩig sẽn waa n sobge, b talla neb wʋsgo n wa b taoore; sʋtãamba n da be b pʋsẽ; b yiisa gomd bala n dig sʋtãamba, la bãad dãmb sãoogame. 17 La yɩɩ woto la bãngd a Izayi gomda taasyã: A rɩka tõnd komslem, tõnd bãase n tʋk a menga.

A Zezi mikame tɩ sẽn pʋgd-b bãmbã da yaa wʋsgo tɩ b na n kõ noor tɩ b rʋʋg kʋɩlgã. 19Sɛb-mit a ye kolg-b lame n leok-ba: «Soaala, y sẽn dabd zĩig ning fãa m na tũ-y lame.» 20T'a Zezi yeel-a: «Waas tara b roto, tɩ yĩngr luiili tar b tʋgdo; Ned Biiga bala n ka tar gãag zĩiga.» 21B karen-biig a ye n waa n yeele: «Soaala, m kota sor n deng n tɩ solg m ba.» 22La a Zezi leok-a lame: «Tũ maam la f bas kɩɩmsa ti b mum taaba.»

Dẽ poore b kẽe koom koglg ne b karen-biisi. 24Ko-wiis rãmba bɛd-bɛda tɩ koglga rat n lisi. Dẽ t'a Zezi gõeeme. 25Karen-biisa kolgame n nek a Zezi n yeel-ba: «Soaala, wa-y tɩ d na n kiime!» 26A Zezi leok-b lame: «Bõe yĩng la y zoet dabeem, tẽeb bilf rãmba?» B sẽn yiki, b tãsa mogrã ne sobgã la bũmb fãa lebga sɩɩ. 27Neba pɛleng yɩkame tɩ b yeele: «Nin-kãnga la a bõe tɩ sobd la mogr meng deegd a noore?»

A Zezi sẽn dʋʋg mogrã n ta Gadar tẽnga la neb a yiibu, sẽn tar Sʋtãan b pʋsẽ, yi yaadẽ n seg-ba. B ra yaa nin-toose al wʋsgo, al tɩ ned ba a ye ra pa le saagd n tũ sor ning sẽn yegd-a be wã ye. 29B sɩnga moonego: «Wẽnd Biiga baooda bõe ne-do? A wat n na n zoe n nams-d lame tɩ wakat nan ka yao?» 30Sẽn vẽsg be bilfu, kurkuy wʋsgo n da wãbd yamdo. 31Sʋtãamba yeela a Zezi: «D kotame tɩ f sã n dig-d ka n yiis bɩ d tɩ kẽ kurkuya!» 32B yeel-b lame tɩ b kẽnge la b yiime n tɩ kẽ rũmsã tɩ b kaoog vugr bala n sig n kẽ mogrã tɩ kooma rɩ-b gilli.
Rũm-kɩɩmba ninga tĩiga n ta n togs tẽnga rãmba rũmsa sãoongo la neb a yiiba sãoogre. 34Tẽnga tõr yiime n na n seg a Zezi; b sẽn yãend-ba, b kos-b lame tɩ b yi b tẽngẽ.

B kẽe koom koglg yɛsa n dʋʋg kʋɩlgã n leb b tẽngẽ. 2B talla põor n wa b taoore. Põora da gãe a gãag zugu. A Zezi sẽn yãend neba tẽebã, b yeela põorã: «Da le bʋ ye, m biiga, tɩ f paama f yel-wẽna sugri.» 3Sɛb-mitba kẽer yeela b sũurẽ: «Yãoã yaa wẽn-tʋʋsa.» 4A Zezi sẽn mi b sũur tagsgã leoka woto:

«Bõe yĩng la y bilgd wẽng y sũurẽ? 5Gomd bʋg togsg la naana n yɩɩda: f paama f yel-wẽna sugri, bɩ: yik n kẽne? 6Sẽn na n yɩlẽ tɩ y bãng tɩ Ned Biiga tara tõog n kõ yel-wẽnd sugr, tẽng zug ka, ade, põore, m yet-f lame: tik n yik, dɩk f gãaga, leb f yiri!» 7Põora yikame n dɩk a gãaga n leb a zakẽ. 8La rẽ kẽesa rabeem kãsenga neb niyns sẽn yãend-ba sũurẽ, la b pẽga Wẽnnaam b sẽn kõ ninsaalb tõog a woto buudu.

A Zezi waa n yiime n loogdẽ, n yãe ned sẽn zĩ fadg reesg zĩigẽ, n boond tɩ Matiye. A Zezi yeel-a lame: «Tũ maam!» La a yik n tũ-b lame. 10B sẽn ta a zakẽ n sɩng rɩɩbo la fadg rɛɛsdb ne yel-wẽn-maandb wʋsg sẽn waa n naag a Zezi ne b karen-biisã. 11 La rog-n-mika tũudba, Farizẽ rãmba, sẽn yãend rẽndã, b yeela karen-biisã: «Yaa wãn tɩ yãmb karen-saamba dɩt ne fadg rɛɛsdb la yel-wẽn-maandba?» 12Mik a Zezi meng ra wʋmame tɩ b na n yeele: «Ka sẽn tar-b laafi n baood tɩɩm soab zĩig ye, yaa sẽn bẽed-ba.
Kẽng-y n tɩ zãms-y gomd kãnga võore: nimbãan-zoeer la m nong n yɩɩd maoongo. Ka nin-sõma wã la m waa n na n boole, yaa yel-wẽn-maandbã.»

Dẽ poore a Zã karen-biisa kolg-b lame n sok-ba: «Bõe yĩng la tõnd ne Farizẽ rãmba loet noore tɩ yãmb karen-biisa pa loetẽ?» 15T'a Zezi na n leok-ba: «Pʋg sɩd zo-rãmb tõe n gãnema b nens wa ku-biisi tɩ pʋg-sɩda ket b sʋk bɩ? Wakat ning n wat n zĩndi tɩ b na n loog ne pʋg-sɩdã, wakat kãng la b na n loe b noore.» 16Ned ka rɩkd peen-paalg sẽn ka wẽ koasla n sũk fu-kʋɩdg ye. Peen-paalga na n zɩsga fuugã t'a le kẽeg n paase. 17Woto me waoog sẽn kʋdg ka rɩkd n sui dã-paalg ye. Ning tɩ pusgi, tɩ rãam daage, tɩ waoog yɩ bõne. Wao-paalg la b suiid dã-paalga, woto bõne ka ye.

B sẽn da ket n gomd la nin-naab a ye sẽn kolge n wõgemd b taoore n yeel-ba: «Ad-y m bi-pugl n ki mars-mars noogã, wa-y n tik-a ne y nugu t'a na vʋʋge.» 19La a Zezi yikame n tũ-a, bãmb ne b karen-biisã. 20Pag a ye sẽn da bẽed mende al yʋʋm piig la a yiibu, kolga b poorẽ n sɩɩs b fuuga noore. 21A ra gomda a sũurẽ: «M sã n sɩɩs b fuugã, m na n paama laafi.» 22A Zezi sẽn wẽneg b poorẽ b yãend-a lame n yeel-a: «Teeg maam, m biiga, tɩ f tẽeb fãag-f lame.» La wakat kãng bala paga wẽneg n paama laafi.

B sẽn ta nin-naaba zakẽ, b yãee neb sẽn peeb-d wɩɩse la neb wʋsg sẽn gũmi, tɩ zak wulumdi. 24A Zezi yeel-b lame: «Yi-y tɩ bi-pugla nan ka ki ye, a gõeeme bala. Neba da laad-b lame.» 25La b sẽn yiis neba yɩnga, a Zezi kẽeme n gãd bi-pugla nugu, t'a yik. 26La kibara sãaga tẽnga fãa.

A Zezi sẽn yik tɩ b loogda, la zoeens a yiib sẽn sɩng pʋgbo la b moonẽ: «Daviid biiga, zoe-y d nimbãanega!» 28B sẽn ta yiri, la zoeensã sẽn kolg-ba tɩ b na n sok-ba: «Yãmb tẽedame tɩ m tõe rẽnna?» Tɩ b leoke: «N-yẽe, Soaala!» 29Tɩ b na n sɩɩs b nina la b yetẽ: «Bɩ yɩ wa y sẽn tẽede!» B nina pukame. 30T'a Zezi na n leok-b pãr pãre: «Maan-y gũusgu, tɩ ned da bãng ye!» 31Zoeensa sẽn yi, pa kaoos ye, b sɩnga b yʋʋra yelegr beelẽ baobgã.

Bãmb sẽn looge, ka kaoos ye, tɩ b tall ned a ye n wa la Sʋtãan-muk n da be a pʋgẽ. 33B sẽn dig Sʋtãana la neda sẽn sɩng goama. Zãma wã pɛleng yɩkame tɩ b yetẽ: «Ned zɩ n yãe woto taar Israyɛl tẽng ye.» 34 Farizẽ rãmba yẽ ra yetame: «Ad-y yaa ne Sʋtãamba naab pãnga la a rigd sʋtãamba.»

A Zezi ra kẽeda tẽn-bɛd la tẽn-bõonese, n maand karengo pʋʋsg rotẽ, n togsd Rĩunga kibar noogã la b sãoogd bãag la pa-keem buud fãa. 36  A Zezi gesa zãma wã n wẽ siri tɩ b ra yɛɛ zãnga, tɩ b nensa surẽ wa piis sẽn pa tar pe-kɩɩma. 37Dẽ la b yeel b karen-biisi: «Kooda sẽn ta kɛɛba labsa, la kɛɛdba sõor paooda. 38 Kos-y pʋʋga soaba t'a tʋm ka-kɛɛdba a pʋʋgẽ.»

«Da tũ-y bu-zẽmba sor ye, la ra kẽ-y Samari rãmb tẽngẽ ye. 6Pʋg-y Israyɛl kamba sẽn kẽ-b weoog wa piisã. 7 Sor zug bɩ y moon tɩ Wẽnd Rĩung kolgame. 8Sãoog-y bãad dãmba, vʋʋg-y kũum, tõog-y yĩng bãase, dig-y Sʋtãamba. B kõo yãmb zaalem, bɩ yãmb me kõ zaalem. 9Da bao-y sãnem bɩ wanzurf ye, da sui-y bõonego y gɩfẽ ye. 10 Da bob-y korgo n kẽnd ye, da zɩ-y fut a yiib ye, da widi neooda ye, da zã-y dasaar ye. Tʋʋm-tʋmd toga ne yaoodo.

Y sã n kẽ tẽn-bil bɩ tẽn-kãsenga, bɩ y kos tɩ b wilg-y nin-sõng zaka tɩ y yõg gãag-sobend be, n ta y loogr daare. 12Y sã n wa kẽed zaka pʋga bɩ y kãab-a laafi, 13la a sã n sɩd tog ne-a, y laafi na sig a pʋgẽ, la y laafi kõn sig-a, a sã n pa tog ne-a ye. 14 Ned sã n mong-y gãag-sobendo, a sã n zãgs y koɛɛg kelgre, bɩ y yi a zakẽ, bɩ a tẽngẽ, la y fugumd y neooda tom. 15

La m yet-y lame tɩ bʋʋda raare, Sodom la Gomor nimbãanega kõn zeng tẽn-kãng rẽnd ye. 16 Ad-y m tʋmd-y-la wa pe-yãans digd-n-yĩids sʋka, bɩ y sɩlem yɩ waaf sɩlem, la y yɩ neb sẽn ka tar b toorẽ yelle wa walle.

Maan-y gũusgu ne ninsaalba; b na n kẽes-y-la bʋʋdo bʋ-kaood bɛda taoore, b na n pãb-y la ne kaase, b pʋʋsg rotẽ. 18Mam yĩnga, b na n vu-y lame n kẽng dĩm dãmb la kombɛɛmba taoore, tɩ m datame tɩ y yɩ m kaset dãmba, bãmb la bu-zẽmba taoore. 19La b sã n wa yõg-y bɩ y ra nams y menga n bao y sẽn na n leok to-to, bɩ y sẽn na n togs bũmb ning ye; y sẽn na n togs bũmb ningã, y na bãng-a wakat kãng bala, 20 tɩ ka yãmb n na n gome, yaa y Ba wã Vʋʋsem n na n gom y zĩigẽ.

Ned na n kɩsa a ba-biiga, tɩ b kʋ, tɩ ba na n kɩs a meng bi-roaka, tɩ kamb na n yik ne b ba rãmba, n kʋ-ba. 22 B fãa na n kisga yãmb, mam yĩnga, la ned ninga sẽn na n kell n modga a yõor tɛka, yẽ soab n na n paam fãagre. 23B sã n digd yãmb tẽn kãngã, bɩ y zoe n kẽ tẽng a to, b sã n pʋg-y be, bɩ y zoe n kẽ tẽng a to; la m yet-y lame tɩ y kõn saag Israyɛl tẽnsã n sɛ, tɩ Ned Biiga nan ka wa ye.

Karen-biig pa yɩɩd a karen-saamb ye, la rakõor pa yɩɩd a zu-soab ye. 25 Karen-biig sã n Wẽnd a karen-saamba, tɩ dakõor wẽnd a zu-soaba, sekame. B sẽn bool zak soab t'a Beelzebul, bõe la b ka n a n yeel a zaka rãmb poorẽ?

Da zoe-y neba ye. Sẽn solg na n pukame la sẽn lud fãa na n lakame. M sẽn togs yãmb bũmb ning fãa likẽ, bɩ y yi n moon yɩnga, 27la m sẽn walem-y bũmb ning y tʋbrẽ bɩ y rʋ roog zugu n pãr-a. 28Da zoe-y lɛ-lɛ sẽn tõe n kʋ-b yĩngã n yaool n pa tõe n kʋ sɩɩga ye. Zoe-y bala, ned ning sẽn tõe n lub bugmẽ sɩɩga la yĩngã. 29Yirsa yiib yɩɩda tãma sɩda? La yirg ba a ye ka lʋɩt tẽnga tɩ y Ba zɩ tiir ye. 30Dɩlla yɩta a wãn ne yãmba. Ad-y y zoobda fãa, Wẽnd tara b sõore! 31Da bʋ-y ye, tɩ yãmb sãoo luin-sugri.

Ned ninga sẽn na n yeel-a neb taoore t'a kẽeda maam, m Ba sẽn be arzãna taoore, mam me na yeel tɩ m kẽeda a soaba. 33 Ned ninga sẽn na n yeel-a neb taoore t'a ka mi maam, mam me na yeele, m Ba sẽn be arzãna taoore, tɩ m ka mi-a ye. 34Da tẽ-y tɩ m talla laafi n wa tẽng zug ye, ka laafi la m tall n wa, yaa zabr sʋʋga. 35M waame n na n zablg ned ne a ba, bi-pugl ne a ma, pag ne a bi-paga.

Fo bɛɛba na n yii f buudẽ. 37Sẽn nong-a a ba bɩ a ma n yɩɩd maam, ka tog ne maam ye; sẽn nong-a a bi-ribl bɩ a bi-pugl n yɩɩd maam, yẽ soab ka tog ne maam ye. 38 Sẽn ka rɩkd-a a pika n pʋg maam, ka tog ne maam ye. 39 Sẽn baood-a a yõore na n menes-a lame; la sẽn menesa a yõor mam yĩnga, na n le paam-a lame. 40  Sẽn deegd-a yãmb sãando, yaa maam la a reegda; sẽn deegd-a maam sãando deegda ned ning sẽn tʋm-a maam.

Ned ninga sẽn maand-a bãngd sãando a sẽn ya bãngda yĩnga, yẽ soab na n paama bãngd dolbo. Ned ning sẽn maand-a nin-sõng sãando a sẽn ya nin-sõnga yĩnga, yẽ soab na n paama nin-sõng dolbo. 42Ned ninga sẽn na n kõ m kom-bãmba nin-yend ko-maasg wamde, a sẽn ya m karen-biiga yĩnga, m yet-y lame t'a kõn kong a rolb ye.»

A Zezi sẽn waa n sagl b Tʋʋm-tʋmdb piig la a yiibã n sɛ, b yiime n kẽ tẽnsã n le sɩng zãmsgo. 2Mik a Zã zĩnda bi-bees roogẽ n wʋm Wẽnd Neda tʋʋma yelle. 3A yiisa a karen-biis tɩ b tɩ sok a Zezi: «Yãmb la sẽn tog n waa soaba bɩ d tog n gũ-la a to?»

A Zezi leok-b lame: «Tɩ togs-y y karen-saamb a Zã y sẽn wʋme la y sẽn yãe bũmb ninga: 5 Zoeens neeme, wobs kẽndame, wãoob sãoogdame, wʋms wʋmdame, sẽn ki-b vʋʋgdame, la b togsda Koe-noogã naong rãmba; 6zu-noog soaba la sẽn ka lakd-a maam wa sor zug kugri n lʋɩ.»

A Zã sẽn tʋm b rãmba sẽn lɛɛg n kuiisẽ la a Zezi sẽn leok woto a Zã poorẽ: «Bõe la y tɩ yãe weoogẽ, tɩ-pol sobg sẽn lengde? 8Bõe la y tɩ yãend sẽ? Ned sẽn yer faong fuugu bɩ? Ad-y sẽn yer-b faong futa vɩɩ nanams zagsẽ. 9Bõe la y tɩ yãend sẽ, y tɩ yãee bãngda? N-ye! La m yet-y lame: yɩɩda bãngda. 10 Ad-y yaa yẽ poorẽ la b gʋlsyã:
M na n yiisa ned n ning m taoore t'a maneg sor ning m sẽn na n tũ wã.

Sɩd-sɩda, m yet-y lame tɩ pagba kamb sʋka, ned ka yɩɩd a Zã, rao ning sẽn kõta sooba ye, la ne rẽ fãa sẽn ya-a yao zʋʋg Arzãn Rĩunga pʋgẽ, yɩɩd-a lame. 12A Zã sẽn sɩng sooba tɛka n dabd marsã, Arzãn Rĩunga waa ne wɩsg-m-menga, lebga sẽn tara pãng tus n kẽ.
Sebr sõng la bãngdba talla wilgri, n tãag a Zã. 14 La sã n yaa a Zã, m ka mi y sã na n deega m goama, ad-y yẽ la Eli ning sẽn na n lɛɛg n wa wã. 15Sẽn tar-a tʋbr bɩ a wʋm!
Bõe la m na n yãe n mak zamaan kãnga? A wẽnda yãas sẽn kõ taab sɛk tẽnga tẽnsʋka, n na n gom taab beedo, 17n yetẽ:
‹Tõnd peeba wɩɩse, tɩ y zãgs saooga, tɩ tõnd kelem kʋʋre, tɩ y zãgs y yãoog toosgo!›

A Zã sɩd waame n pa rɩtẽ la a pa yũud ye, tɩ b yet tɩ Sʋtãan n be a pʋgẽ. 19Ned Biiga waame, n dɩtẽ la a yũuda, tɩ b yet tɩ b baad dɩ-rɩta la rã-yũuda, tɩ b baad fadg rɛɛsdba la yel-wẽn-maandba zoa. La b tʋʋm sõma wã waa n kõo kaseto tɩ Yam Pidunga soab bee ne-ba.
Dẽ poore b yika zabre ne tẽns niyns sẽn yãend-b bõn-bãna n yɩɩd tẽns a taaba n yaool n ka tek b zʋgã.

Yel-beed ne foo, Korozein tẽnga! Yel-beed ne foo, Bɛtsayid tẽnga! Wẽnd makr niyns sẽn maan yãmb pʋgẽ sã n da maanẽ Tir la Sidõ, yaa daar zãr la be rãmba yeelgẽ sũ-pa-noang futu la b bilmẽ b mens tompɛglemẽ, n teemẽ zʋgo. 22Yaa rẽ yĩng la m yet-y:

bʋʋda raare, Tir ne Sidõ sɩbgr kõn ta y rẽnd ye. 23 La foo, Kafarnaom, fo tẽedame tɩ f na n lugame n tãag saaga? Ade, bʋg-tẽng la f na n sirg n lʋɩ. Bãng tɩ bõn-bãn-niyns sẽn maan f pʋgẽ sã n da maanẽ Sodom tẽnga, a ket n yɛsẽ la rũnna. 24Yaa rẽ yĩng la m yet-fo: bʋʋda raare, a Sodom sɩbgr kõn ta f rẽnd ye.»
A Zezi waa n zẽka b koɛɛg n gom woto: «M Ba, yĩngr la tẽng Soaala, m pʋʋsd-y la barka y sẽn solg woto sɩlem dãmba la yam dãmba n yaool n togs nin-bõonese. 26N-ye! Woto n sɩd yɩ y raabo, m Ba sõngo!
M sẽn tar fãa yaa m Ba n kõ-ma. Ned ka mi Biiga sã n ka Ba, la ned me ka mi Ba sã n ka Biigã, bɩ ned ninga sẽn paam-a Biiga wilgri.

Wa-y m nengẽ, yãmb fãa sẽn tar-b pɛta la sẽn zɩt-b zɩɩb n yõrdẽ, tɩ m na yols y fãa. 29 Tʋk-y m zɩɩbã la lebg-y m karen-biisi, tɩ m yaa ned sẽn ka mi sũ-toog la zẽk-m-menga, la y sɩɩga zu-loees na paam yolsgo. 30Bãng-y tɩ m sẽn na n tʋk-y zɩɩb ninga yaa faasga la tʋʋsga bʋgsa.»
Sibr daar a ye, a Zezi waa n loogda kood sẽn bɩ sʋka. Kom da tara b karen-biisã tɩ b kũus ka-zut n tẽg n wãbe. 2Farizẽ rãmb yãeeme n yeel-ba: «Yãmb karen-biisa maanda sẽn kis vʋʋsg daare!»

T'a Zezi na n yeel-ba: «Dɩlla yãmb pa karen a Daviid sẽn maan bũmb ninga, kom sẽn waa n yõk-a, yẽnda ne a tũud-n-taase? 4 Ad-y b kẽe wẽnd doogẽ n dɩ buri niyns sẽn da rɩk n kõ Wẽndã. Yẽ ne a tũud-n-taasa yaool n da pa tõe n dɩ bur kãens ye, tɩ maan-kʋʋdba bal n da tar sor n dɩ-ba.
Bũmb a to, y pa karem Noora sebrẽ tɩ vʋʋsga daare maan-kʋʋdba tʋmda wẽnd doogẽ tɩ ka yel-wẽnd bɩ? 6M yet-y lame: sẽn yɛs-a yãmb taoorã yɩɩda wẽnd doogã. 7
Yãmb sã n dag n wʋme gomd kãnga võore: m nonga nimbãan-zoeere n yɩɩd maoongo, y kõn sak n ningẽ taale neb sẽn ka maan yel-wẽnd ye. 8Bãng-y tɩ Ned Biigã n so vʋʋsga daare.»
B sẽn looge, pʋʋsga roogẽ la b tɩ kẽ. 10Zemsg neere, nug kɩɩng a ye soab n da be be la Farizẽ rãmba soka a Zezi: «Bãad tõe n sãooga vʋʋsga daar bɩ?» B soka woto n na n kẽes a Zezi yellẽ.

Dẽ la a Zezi leok-ba: «Yãmb sʋka, ãnd n tar pe-yãang a ye tãa, t'a lʋɩ bokẽ vʋʋsga daare t'a zãgs a tɩ gãd-a n yiisi? 12Y mi tɩ ninsaal yɩɩda pesg al zĩig sẽn zãre. Dẽnna bõn-sõng maaneg ka kis vʋʋsga daar ye.»
Dẽ poore b yeela koamsã: «Tẽeg f nug.» A tẽega a nugu, nuga vʋʋgame n ya kɛgeng wala a yembrã. 14Farizẽ rãmba yiime la b yẽsa ne taaba b sẽn na n maanega n paam a Zezi n kʋ.
B sẽn bãng rẽ, a Zezi yiime. Wʋsg tũ-b lame. 16B sãooga koms rãmba fãa la b yeel-b lame tɩ b ra gom tɩ ned wʋm ye. 17Woto taasa bãngda Izayi gomde:

Ad ned ning m sẽn yãk m tʋʋmda yĩnga. Yaa m zoa nongre, m yam kẽe-a la zãnga. M na n sika m Vʋʋsem a zugu, t'a wilg bu-zẽmba sõmblem la sɩd sore. 19A kõn yɩ zab baooda la bʋrg soab ye. Ned kõn wʋm a koɛɛg sotiisẽ ye.

Tipol sẽn kaooge, a kõn kũk-a n baas ye fitil laong sẽn ket n nukd bug-zõose, a kõn kiis-a n baas ye al n wa tõog tɩ sɩd la sõmblem reeg zĩig zãng n yãmbe. 21  Yẽnda la dʋni rãmba fãa na n maan b teegda.

Sʋtãan n da kẽ neda t'a soaba ya zoanga la muka la b tall-a lame n wa a Zezi taoore la bãmb sãoog-a lame t'a gomd la a neẽ. 23Zãma wã yɛɛsame n yetẽ: «Nin kãnga kaa Daviid biigã?» 24 Farizẽ rãmba wʋmame n leoke: «A sã n digd sʋtãamba, yaa ne Sʋtãamba naab, a Beelzebul, pãnga.»

A Zezi sẽn mi b pʋga yeel-b lame: «Rĩung buud fãa sẽn welg sagse, rĩung kãng baooda a wãabo. Tẽng a ye rãmba bɩ zak a ye rãmb sã n welg taaba, tẽng kãng bɩ zak kãng ka tõe n yals ye. 26Sʋtãan sã n digd a sʋtãan taaga, a welga a yiibu, a naam na n yɩɩ wãn n vigli?

Sã n yaa ne a Beelzebul pãng la mam digd Sʋtãamba, yãmb neba rigd-b la ne ãnda rẽnna? Dɩlla bãmb n na n kao y bʋʋdo. 28La sã n ya ne a Vʋʋsem Sõng pãng la m digd sʋtãamba, bɩ y bãng tɩ Wẽnd Rĩunga taa yãmba.
Bũmba to yɛsa: ned yɩta a wãn n kẽ gãndaoog zakẽ n zɛ a teedo, a sã n ka reng n yõk-a n sẽbe? Sẽbdame n yaool n zɛ teedo.

Sẽn ka-a mam zoa, yaa mam bɛyã, sẽn ka suiid-a mam sẽn suiidẽ, sẽegdame. 31Yaa rẽ la m yeta: ninsaalba na n paam b yel-wẽnd la wẽn-tʋʋr buud fãa sugri la a Vʋʋsem Sõng tʋʋda kõn paam sugr ye. 32 Sẽn tʋʋs-a Ned Biiga na paam sugri, la sẽn tʋʋs-a Vʋʋsem Sõngo kõn paam sugr dũni kãnga la dũni ninga sẽn pʋgda ye.
Tɩ-sõngo womda bi-sõma. Tɩ-yoog biis me na yɩ yoodo. Tɩɩg biig n wilgd a sã n yaa sõng bɩ yoogo. 34 Wag-bi buudu, y goama yɩta a wãn n yɩ sõma tɩ y mens ya wẽnse? Sẽn pid sũuri n wat noorẽ!

Nin-sõng yiisda bõn-sõma tɩ bõn-sõma la a bĩng a baoorẽ, la nin-wẽng sẽn bĩng bõn-wẽnsã, yiisda bõn-wẽnse. 36M yet-y lame, gomd yaalg buud fãa ned sẽn na n yiis a noorẽ, b na sok-a bʋʋda raare. 37Yaa f sẽn yiis f noorẽ n na n yiis foo bʋʋdẽ bɩ n na n paalg-fo.»

Noor sebra mitba la Farizẽ rãmb kẽere yeel-b lame: «Soaala, d tʋllame tɩ y maan bõn-bãnd tɩ d yãende.» 39 B leok-b lame: «Zãmb la yoob zamaan kamba rata wẽnd makre la b ka na n paam wẽnd makr a to ye; a Zonas makra bal la m na n kõ-ba. 40 Wala a Zonas sẽn pa mogra Bõn-nind pʋg rasem a tã la yʋnd a tã, wotome Ned Biiga na n paa tẽng pʋgẽ rasem a tã la yʋnd a tãabo.

Bʋʋda raare, Niniv rãmb na n yika ne rũnna zamaana rãmba la b na n mong-b-la bʋʋm, tɩ bãmb sẽn wʋm a Zonas koɛɛga, b sɩbga b mense; sẽn yɛs-a ka wã yɩɩda a Zonas. 42 Bʋʋda raare, tẽn-zãorgẽ Dĩmpoaka na n yika ne rũnna zamaana rãmba la a na n mong-b-la bʋʋm tɩ yẽ yii al Mooga sɛtmẽ n wa kelg gom-minim naab, a Salomo, la sẽn be-a ka wã yɩɩda a Salomo!

Sʋtãan dẽgd sã n yi n bas a sẽn da kẽ a soaba, a gõoda weoogo n baood vʋʋsg zĩiga n ka yãetẽ ye. 44A yeta a sũurẽ: m na n leba m zĩ-kʋdgẽ. A watame n mik t'a yaa vɩʋʋgo, mik tɩ b maneg pɩɩs-a lame, tɩ bũmb fãa be a zĩigẽ.
T'a na n lɛɛg n wa ne a sʋtãan taas a yopoe sẽn yɩɩd yẽ ne wẽnem, tɩ b wa kẽ-a. Bãng-y tɩ nin-kãng yell lebgda wẽng n yɩɩg pĩnda. Dũnna zamaan yooka yell na n yɩɩ boto.»

A Zezi ra ket n sõsda ne zãma wã la b ma ne b saam-biisa waa n bee yɩng n dat n gom ne-ba. [ 47Ned a ye n wilgi: y ba la y ma n be dignoorẽ la b rat n leok-y la bũmbu.] 48A Zezi yeela sẽn waa n togsa wã: «Ãnda la mam ma, la m saam-biisi?»
La b zẽka b nug n tees b karen-biisã, n yetẽ: «Ad m ma la m saam-biisi. 50Ned ninga sẽn maand-a m Ba sẽn be arzãna yam, yẽ yaa saam-biiga, la tão, la ma, m yĩnga.»
Kɩɩb a Naamde kibare. Rao a yembr n da tar a kamba a yiibu, la a yembrã ra yaa kɩɩba (bala, a ma wã ra kiime n bas-a), t’a yʋʋr la a Naamde. Kɩɩb a Naamd da tara zũur a nugẽ.

La, b yiibã sã n yi n dabd kʋɩlga, sakã nebã fãa yetame, t'a Naamd zũurã be neere. La b sã n wa lebg n kuili, a yembrã yeta a ba wã, t’a pidg a Naamd zũurã, n kõ yẽ. La, a pʋda yɩɩlle: «Pagbã loogda, a Naamd zũurã be neere, raopã zãnga, a Naamd zũurã be neere.»

La, a ba wã sɩd wa makame, n kong n deeg zũurã n kõ-a. B sẽn le yi, n dabd kʋɩlg yasa, nebã yetame, tɩ kɩɩb a Naamd be neere. B sẽn lebg n kuili, a yembrã le yeela a ba wã, t’a kʋ a Naamde, bala, nebã fãa yetame, t’a Naamd be neere.

A ba wã sɩd makame n konge, n ya n kʋ a Naamd n mum-a. La, ne rẽ fãa, nebã fãa sã n loogdẽ, b yetame, tɩ biigã yaoogã be neere. Biigã le yeelame, t’a ba wã kõdg yaoogã tomã, n fãeege, tɩ nebã bas b goamã.
La, a ba wã sɩd kõdga kabrã tomã n lobe. La, saag sẽn wa n ni, tɩ koomã zoe n kẽ bokã n pidi, sakã pagbã ne rapã sã n loogdẽ, b yetame, tɩ kabrã koom be neere.
Biigã gom-toogã yĩng kɩtame, tɩ ba wã ne biigã, naag taab n kẽ, n na n kõdg koomã, la, b sẽn kẽ wã, b yiibã fãa paa be n ki. Bi-kaseng segdame, n tall bi-kaseng yam.
Arzẽk soab a ye kibare. Arzɛk soab n da be tẽng a yembr pʋgẽ, n tar pagb la kamb wʋsgo. A rũm-bãoonegã pa tõe n sõd n sa ye : Niisi, piisi, bʋʋse, noos la kĩini.

Fo sã n pa tar ligd me, f ka tõe n paam bũmb a nengẽ ye. Ned bʋʋg bɩ a pesg sã n lʋɩ a rũmsã sʋka, a ka le yit ye; yẽ n na n soog-a. La, sãan sã n wa sig-a, yaa rũng ning a sẽn ka so wã, la a na n yõk n kʋ n moneg sãanã, sẽn na yɩl, tɩ sãanã sũur yɩ noogo, t’a ning-a barka.
La ne rẽ fãa, a ra koosda gʋʋr la taba. La, ra yaa ned me, sẽn dɩk ligdi, tɩ lebg a Wẽnnaam. Ned sã n da a bũmbu, t’a ligd pa a nengẽ, a soab pa tõe n le paam ligd-kãng ye.

Bala, nebã yetame, tɩ f sã n maan sãan yel-sõmde, a wat n leba f menga, wall f kamba. La nin-kãngã ra yĩmame, tɩ yẽ sẽn wẽgd nebã, tõe n leba a menga, tɩ b ka gomd a kambã ye. La, sẽn ya yell n tɩ yɩɩda, yaa tɩ f tɩɩm ka tõe-a ye. Fo ka tõe me, n bool-a bʋʋd ye, tɩ bala, a tara tõogo, hal tɩ tẽngã nebã fãa wa gomd a yelle.

La sẽn wa n beẽ n beẽ, Wẽnnaam nin-sõng a ye, n da bʋʋg ne pesg n na n gʋʋle. Tɩ bʋʋgã tõsga a wĩirã, n kẽng n tɩ lagem a rũmsã. Tɩ nin-sõngã yet t’a na n gome, tɩ tẽngã nebã yeel-a, t’a pĩnd n sĩnd a noorã, tɩ arzɛkã soaba ka nin-sõng ye. La ne rẽ fãa, rao wã kell n talla raoodo, n kẽng n tɩ yãnd arzɛkã soaba n yeel-a :

«Mam daa bʋʋg n loe n na n gʋʋle, t’a tõsg a wĩirã n wa naag yãmb rũmsã. Ad-a sẽn gãe, m bõos n yõk-a ». Tɩ arzɛkã soab leok-a : «Yaa ziri, bʋ-kãngã roga ka n bɩ ka , yaa mam bʋʋga; da bao m noor yibeoogã ye». La, bʋʋgã soab sẽn mi a yellã yĩnga, a ka bao n na n bʋ ne-a ye. A yeela arzɛkã soab bala : «Wẽnnaam yaa m kaset soaba. Foom, la m kaset a yiib-n-soaba.

Sã n mikame, tɩ bʋʋgã yaa mam dẽnda, ka ne vẽere, d na gese. Fo rũmsã fãa na sa, n bas-fo ». Sɩd me, sẽoogã sẽn wa n ta, saag n tãs a rũmsã n kʋ n kell rũms piiga. Dẽ poore, we-baas n wa n yõg a rũmsã fãa, n wãb n kell rao wã bʋʋg bala. Rẽ wã, Wẽnnaam deegda ka-pãng soab zĩig n zabe.
Kũum ne dasãare ! Rao n wa n kẽng bagre. La, bagrã soab yeel-a lame, t’a bao yɩbrg-vɩɩga, n bila a yĩngã, la a rɩke, n maan maoongo, rasem a yopoe pʋgẽ, sã n ka rẽ, a na n kiime.

Rao wã pelẽnga, yɩkame, t’a yik n dɩk weoogã sore, n tar yãbr n teesdẽ. La, a wa n tɩ sega pʋg-yãanga a yembre. La, a sok-a lame t’a yeele : «Mam kẽngame, n na n tɩ bao m yɛl võore, bagr soab nengẽ, t’a yeele, tɩ m bao yɩbrg-vɩɩg n bil m yĩngã, n maan maoongo.

La, m na n paam-a la yɛ?». La pʋg-yãangã yeelame : «Tɩ sã n ya woto tɛka, ka toog ye. Bao dasãare, n kẽng zĩ-peelẽ wã, n tɩ gãand zãmbeelle, f poorã zugu, n nodg f ninã, wa f kiime. Yɩbrdã sã n yã foo, b na n tẽeme, tɩ yaa kũum, tɩ b na n dɩ. Tɩ f paam-ba, n yõke.»
Rao wã kẽngame, n sɩd maane, wa pʋg-yãangã sẽn yeelã. Sẽn yɩ bilf bala, la yɩbrg naab sẽn laale, n wa ta n sãage, n kẽng n tɩ ta, n zomb tɩɩga, n yetẽ : «Õ’õ, mam nan pa rɩ kũum, ne dasãar ye».

Rẽ poore, yʋʋm a tãab yɩbrgo, n wa n ta, n laandẽ, n dat n sigi, n dɩ-a. La, yɩbrg naab bool-a lame, n soke : «Fo sẽn dog tɛka, fo yãa kũum ne dasãare ?» T’a yet tɩ ayoo ! «Bɩ, f loog n bao zĩiga, n zaoonde».
Sẽn kaoos bilfu, la yʋʋm a yiib yɩbrg sẽn wa n ta n laandẽ, n dat n dɩ rao wã, tɩ yɩbrg naab bool-a n soke : «Fo sẽn dog tɛka, fo rɩɩ kũum ne dasãare? » T’a yet tɩ ayoo! «Bɩ, f bao zĩig n zaoonde».

Yʋʋmd a yembr yɩbrg me, n ta, n laandẽ. Tɩ b naabã sok-a : «Fo sẽn dog tɛka, fo rɩɩ kũum ne dasãare ?» La, a leokame, tɩ yẽ sẽn dɩ a buudu, yaa wʋsgo. La, yɩbr naab yeel-a lame, t’a gũus a menga, la a ka kelg ye.
A yɩkame, n tɩ zomb rao wã zugu, n na n dɩ-a, tɩ rao wã be a nao wã gãdbẽ, n tar a mengã yĩng bilbu.   Rẽ wã, nin-kẽem sã n sagl biiga, bɩ a reege, la a ra paoog-a, t’a yãa pĩnda.
Baag ka wãbd gãngãogẽ n le yaas n ges reem ye.
M kẽnda m na paam noaag yiri, m ka kẽnd a noos waoog yir ye.
Zĩrẽ zoeta yʋʋm tusri, tɩ sɩd wa yõk-a raar a ye.
Sẽn togs-a zõang ma kʋʋr n gãt-a nugu.
Bas-m goabga, sõng tɩ b ra gãd n yɩɩda.
Pagb yɩɩd taab ka pend bedrem ye.
Pʋg rʋmd ka mi t’a sɩd yaa naab ye.
Ned sã n wa rigd n yĩida, rɩ tɩ gãe n yĩid n kae.
Ba-bil yeelame tɩ maoor noog yaa lub-m tɩ m lub-fo.
To saoog n dɩkda, to zʋg ka rɩkd ye.
Ned sã n kẽnd kiu-kiu, bɩ a tẽeg lama-lama yelle.
Biig ka yã a ma wẽnd n ye t’a ba sãam ligdi.
Saag sã n pãb noaga, a mit n daad-a.
Ned tõeeme n tɩ baa gãande, la a ka tõe ta a muma nin ye.
Bi-bɛɛg sã n be ra-poore, a to n be nin-taore.
Wʋm tɩ lar kʋʋd yẽbga, ka rɩkd n lob koomẽ ye.
Ned sã n ka ki, bɩ a ra sõda yẽn ye.
Yẽnd sã n ya a ye, bɩ a yɩ pɛɛlga.
Rulg yeelame tɩ saol kegr, yãa pĩnda.
Zug sã n põnge, ka pam ye.
Kɩɩm sã n pãb ned yʋngo, a ges-a-la wĩntoogo.
Ra wa-m yiri, yaa ra wa-m yiy a yiibu.
Koadeng yeelame tɩ yõor la gɛla.
Pag yood-a a na sãõoga sɩda.
Yibeoog saag sã n ka wa ne boɛɛga, zaabr saag na wa ne-a.
Fo sã n yã ned ne a rɩɩgẽ bãaga, ra yet-a kõn ta beoog ye.
Ned mɩɩ-a tõẽta laa ka mia kʋʋd ye.
Pãng sãn tũũd sore, bʋʋm bʋta moogo.
Noaag ka kongd koom daar a ye, n wãag no-sar ye.
Soaamb ka nobd-n-yɩɩg a gãong ye.
Sũ-keelem la wãbre, yẽn gãee yaa zaalem.
Wãbr ne fɩɩlg ka naagd taab ye.
Ned met-a neer n zems a pag pende.
Ned sã n ka feoog a sẽeg-n-gõaaga, a ka feoogd a karg gõaag ye.

M ba Soaamb ne m ba Kãoongo. We-rũmsã fãa, wa n tigma taaba, n yiis noor n yeele : «Ned ning fãa sẽn wɩd a to, bɩ weeogã kʋ-a.» La, b yãka m ba Soaamba, t’a lʋɩ b taoore, n gese, tɩ rũmsã fãa tũ noorã.

Dẽ poore, m ba Soaamb baoo ki ne bʋdb koore, n tɩ be sor noor pĩig zugu, n bʋtẽ. La, we-rũng fãa sẽn loogd n pʋʋs m ba Soaamba, a yet-a lame : «Mam me, wa n maanda bilf-bilf ka, n gũud saaga.» La, a soab sã n ta taoore, a yetame :

«Yaa tɩ d ra wɩd d taaba yĩnga, la a maand woto bɩ, sã n ka rẽ, ãnda n tõe n bʋd pĩig zug n paam ki ?» A soab sã n yeel woto, a rokdame n lʋɩ n ki, tɩ m ba Soaamb kẽng n tɩ rɩk-a, n kuil n tɩ maneg n rɩ ne a paga.

Sẽn beẽ n beẽ, m ba Kãoong wa n wʋma kibarã, t’a bao kaam ne rʋko, n tʋk n dɩk sore, n teesd m ba Soaamb sẽn beẽ wã sẽnẽ. A sẽn wa n ta m ba Soaamb zĩigẽ wã, a pʋʋs-a lame. M ba Soaamb sok-a lame: «Yaa noog ne rʋko?»
La, m ba Kãoong leok-a lame : «Mam tʋka kaam ne rʋko, n dabd n na n tɩ pãnem m zugu. Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel-a, tɩ, Wẽnd na sik laafɩ. T’a Kãoong le rɩk sore.
La, a sẽn wa n zãage, m ba Soaamb roogame, n yals n yeele : «Way ! B sẽn yeel tɩ d ra wɩd taab yĩng bɩ, sã n ka rẽ, zu-koeemdã, fo zoobdã bee yɛ, sẽn pãnemde?»
M ba Soaamb me rokame, n lʋɩ n ki, t’a Kãoong lebg n wa rɩk-a. Rẽ wã, yam yɩɩd m zoa sãamda zoodo.
Zood yõbg yelle. Wakat fãa, kinkirg a yembr n yit weoogã pʋgẽ, n lebgd ned n wat n dood tẽn-bil a ye raaga. La, a wa n yõga zood ne rao a ye. La, a sã n wa raag fãa, b bee ne taaba.
La, rao wã n yikame, n zomb a wed-moaag n na n tɩ kaag-a. La, a sẽn wa n ta zakẽ wã n pʋʋse, a zoa wã sẽn ya kinkirgã, sɩd yiime n pʋʋs-a, n lebg n kẽ a roogẽ. La, vugr bala, zakã lebga kãgre.

Tɩ rao wã ket n zĩẽ, sẽn yi bilfu, la kinkirgã ba wã la a ma wã, tɩ yi n pʋʋs-a n lebg n kẽ. La, rao wã wed-moaagã wa n kʋmame, t’a tik n yiki, n tɩ kolg-a. La wed-moaagã yeel-a lame : «Mam yãbr a tãab-n-soabã sã n mik tõnd ka, b na n kʋʋ tõndo».

La rao wã lebgame, n tɩ zĩndi. La wed-moaagã le kʋmame, tɩ rao wã yik n wudg n tɩ ta, n yɩk n zomb wed-moaagã, n na n zoe n kuili. La, a zoa wã me lebga neda, n zomb a wed-moaaga, n na n dig-a. B sẽn tar taab rigbu, rao wã wed-moaagã wa n yaame, tɩ bɛ wã ket n pʋgd-a. Tɩ rao wã yeel a wed-moaagã : «Sã n yaa m ba ne m ma n da foo n kõ maam, bɩ f ra sak tɩ yãnd paam maam ye».

Wakat-kãnga, rao wã kẽem bãnga a yamẽ, t’a yao wã bee yell pʋga. A tik n yikame, n dɩk a bug-raoogo, n bob n yɩk n zomb a wed-moaagã, n dɩk sorã, n na n babs-ba. La, a wa n tool n ne-b, b sẽn wate, tɩ wubsgã tʋke. T’a yalse, n maneg a bug-raoogã, n tees n gũudẽ.
La, a yao wã wa n pɩʋʋgame, t’a kẽemã kell n tees bug-raoogã, ned ning sẽn pʋgdã zugu, n wẽ, tɩ kinkirgã yak n lʋɩ n ki. Rẽ wã, zood yõgda ne gũusgu.
M ba Laabo kibare. Daar a ye, m ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katre, wa n yii gõobo. La, fo sã n yã gɛla, n yet tɩ ad m gelle, f kiidame. La, a Katr ra ka mi ye.
La, b gõobã pʋga, b tɩ yãa gɛla, tɩ m ba Katr yɩ tao-tao, n yeel tɩ, ad m gɛla, la, a rokame, n lʋɩ n ki, tɩ m ba Soaamb tebg-a n kuili.
Talla woto, hal tɩ wa gilg n ta m ba Laabo. B sẽn wa n tar gõob weoogã pʋga, m ba Soaamb wa n yeela m ba Laabo, t’a tees nug-goabga, tɩ yẽ tees nug-rɩtgo. La, a Laab sakame. Mik gɛl n da be be sẽnẽ.

A sẽn wa n kẽn n ta gɛlã zĩigẽ wã, a sĩnda a noore, n kell n sãag n tɩ seg m ba Soaamba. La, m ba Soaamb gõdga ne a Laabo, n lebg n wa ta gɛlã zĩigẽ, n yeel-a : «Yeel tɩ ad m gɛ... T’a Laab yeele :  «Ad m gɛ...»
Soaamb wa n baas n yeela m ba Laabo, t’a yeel tɩ : «Ad m gɛla.» La, sẽn yaa m ba Soaamb n deng yeelã yĩnga, a kiime, t’a Laab rɩk-a, n tɩ maneg n dʋge. Rẽ wã, sɩlem-bag-bage, yaa sɩlem-kẽkdga.

M ba Soaamb la m ba Katre kibare. Daar a ye, noosã maana tigr n na n sao. La, sẽn na n yɩlẽ, tɩ reemã yɩ noogo, m ba Soaamb kẽnga ne kʋnde, koom ne guugu, n tɩ ta n pʋʋs-ba. La noosã soka m ba Soaamba : «Yaa noog ne kʋnde, koom la guugu ? ».
La, m ba Soaamb leok-b lame : «Kʋndã, yaa sẽn na n tar n wẽedẽ, tɩ y saoodẽ. Guugã, yaa sẽn na n tar n gũud yãmba. Koomã, yaa sẽn na n tar n walgd zĩigã, tɩ wubsgã ra yikdẽ ye.»

La, m ba Soaamb wa n sɩnga kʋndã wẽebo, hal tɩ noosã tar saooga. M ba Soaamb wa n basa kʋndã wẽebo, la a yɩ tao-tao, n dʋ tɩɩgã ne koomã, n walge. Noosã zoe n kẽe roogẽ, n tẽed tɩ yaa saaga n niidẽ. T’a sig n dɩk a guugã, n kẽ n pãb noosã, n kʋ, n wʋk n sui a waoogẽ, n kuil n tɩ kõ a paga, t’a maneg n dʋg tɩ b wãbe.

M ba Katr pagã, wa n na n moka bugum, m ba Soaamb zakẽ wã. La, b yãka nemdã n kõ-a, t’a kuil n tɩ wãb ne a sɩda. La, m ba a Katr yeela a pagã : «Ad nemdã yaa noog dɛ». La, a pagã sũur puugame t’a yeel-a  : «Fo ka bark ye. Fo taaba fãa wat n kõta b pagbã rɩɩbo, tɩ b rɩtẽ. La fo zɩ, n wa ne rɩɩb ka ye».

M ba Katr sãdame n tɩ nek m ba Soaamb n soke : «Fo maanda wãn to-to, n paamd nemdã woto fãa, n wat n dɩt ne f zak-rãmba? » La, m ba Soaamb yeel-a lame : «Beoogo, bɩ y wa ne kʋnde, koom la gũug tɩ d kẽnge». Katr tɩ maka gõeem, n kong n yik n yõgneg bugum n wa yeel m ba Soaamba, tɩ beoogã vẽegame, la, a yik tɩ b looge.

Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel-a : «Kẽng-y, tɩ pʋg-yãang sã n tĩs bɩ y wa tɩ d looge». M ba Katr tɩ baoo tɩpare, n to, n kẽng n tɩ ning pʋg-yãang kokorẽ. La, pʋg-yãang tĩsame t’a lebg n wa yã m ba Soaamba, n yet t’a yik tɩ b looge. T’a Soaamb yeel-a : «Kẽng-y tɩ no-raoog sã n kũmi, bɩ y lebg n wa». M ba Katr kẽngame, n tɩ wẽoog no-raoog kokor tɩ noaagã kelme, t’a lebg n wa.

M ba Soaamb yaool n mak n kongame, n yiki, tɩ b tũ taab n looge. La, a Soaamb yeela m ba Katre : «Y sã n ta, bɩ y pʋʋs-b fãa. B sã n sok teed nins yãmb sẽn zãadã yelle, bɩ y yeel-ba : «Kʋndã, yaa sẽn na n tar n wẽedẽ, tɩ y saoodẽ. Koomã, yaa sẽn na n tar n walgd zĩigã, tɩ wubsgã ra yikdẽ ye. Guugã, yaa sẽn na n tall n kẽ n pãb yãmb n kʋ».

B sẽn wa n ta, m ba Katr pʋʋsa noosã, tɩ b sok-a : «M ba Katre ! kʋndã, koomã, la guugã, yaa sẽn na n tar n maand bõe ?». Tɩ m ba Katr yeele: «Koomã, yaa sẽn na n tar n walgd zĩigã, tɩ wubsgã ra yikdẽ ye. Kʋndã, yaa sẽn na n tar n wẽedẽ, tɩ y saoodẽ. Guugã, yaa sẽn na n tall n kẽ n pãb yãmb n kʋ».

M ba Katr wa n sɩd sɩnga kʋndã wẽebo, tɩ noosã me sɩng saooga, wa yell ka be ye. La, m ba Katr wa n yikame, n dɩk koomã, n walge. Tɩ noosã zoe n kẽ roogã pʋga, n yɩ tao-tao, n pak fenetrã, n bas vɩʋʋgo. A Katr me, yɩɩ tao-tao, n wa ta, n na n pãb-b ne guugã. Tɩ noosã tũ fenetrã, n yi, tɩ b kõbdã sʋʋg n pa. M ba Katr sẽn yã rẽ wã, a tẽedame, tɩ yaa noosã, t’a kẽng n ta, n kool n sui a waoogẽ, n tall n kuili.

A sẽn ta a yiri, a yeela a pagã : «Vaag baag bɛndã, n lob tãmpʋʋrẽ, tɩ rɩ-bɛd waame». La, a pagã sɩd vaaga baag bɛndã, n lobe. La, m ba Katr sẽn zuk waoogã, n pẽes no-kõbdã, n tẽed t’a na n yãa noaag a pʋgẽ, a pa yã baa fɩ. T’a sũurã sãame, t’a yãs sɩɩ... Rẽ wã, pẽdgr yiisda yam, n tõe kɩte, t’a soab kẽ moogo, t’a baasg lebg sũ-sãanga.

M ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katre, ne m ba Weoognaaba kibare. M ba Soaamba, m ba Katre, ne m ba Weoognaaba, naaga taaba, n ko ki, n ning baoor tɩ pidi. La ned kam fãa, sẽn wa n na n leb a yiri, b kõo taab sɛka, n na n lebg n wa pʋɩ ki wã.

La, m ba Soaamb lebgame, n wa kẽ baoorã pʋgẽ, n dɩ ki wã, n kell kɩdga. La, sɛkã daar sẽn wa n ta, b fãa sɩd waame, n na n pʋɩ ki wã. La, b sẽn lɩk baoorã pʋga, b mikame, tɩ ki wã kella kɩdga. Tɩ b sok ned fãa, n na n bãnge, ãnda n dɩ ki wã. La, b soka m ba Katre : «Yaa foom, n dɩ ki wã bɩ?»

La, m ba Katr leokame : «Ayoo ! Mam sẽn yi ka, badaarã, mam kẽnga keedẽ, n yi keedẽ, n kẽng yõobẽ, n yi yõobẽ, n kẽng bʋdbẽ, n yi bʋdbẽ, n kẽng koobẽ, n yi koobẽ, n kẽng bɛng rɩgsgo, n yi bɛng rɩgsgo, n kẽng kẽebgẽ, n yi kẽebgẽ, n kẽng tigsgẽ, n yi tigsgẽ, n kẽng rɩɩbẽ. Mam sẽn nan wat la woto ».

La, b soka m ba Soaamba, ne m ba Weoognaaba, tɩ bãmb me leoke, wa, m ba Katr sẽn leokã. La, b sẽn na n maan bũmb ning marsã, n bãng ned ning sẽn dɩ-a ki wã, b rɩka ka-kellã, n pãb n yelge, n maan zom-pãrga, n ning wamd pʋgẽ, n dɩk n doglg nobg wɛɛsẽ n yaool yeel ned fãa, t’a yɩk n zʋʋg zomã ne wamdã.

La, a Katr ne, a Weoognaab tõog n yɩkame, n zʋʋg wamdã ne zomã, tɩ bũmb ka maan ye. La, m ba Soaamb sã n mak t’a na n yɩk fãa, a ka tõe ye, t’a yetẽ : «Yaa fũugã n liib maam». T’a yãk fũugã, n dɩglge, n le mak t’a na n yɩke, n ka tõog ye, n le yeele : «Yaa mam puglã n liib maam».

B fãa wa n bãnga vẽeneg pay, marsã, tɩ yaa m ba Soaamba, n dɩ ki wã. Tɩ b na n dig-a. B sẽn tar a rigbã, b wa tɩ n yãa nob-miidu, la, m ba Soaamb yɩɩ tao-tao, n yeel-ba : «Yãmb basa rɩɩbo, n digd maam zaalem ». Tɩ b fãa naag taaba, n sok-a : «Rɩɩbã bɛ ?»

Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeele : «Ad nob-miidu ». La, b fãa kẽe nob-miidã wãbre, n bas tɩ m ba Soaamb zoe n solge. Rẽ wã, sɩlem-wẽng soab sã n be sull pʋgẽ, sullã neb raabo, ka baasd neer ye. Rẽnd tɩ b mao t’a soab toeem zʋgo.
Bi-bɩɩg a yembr kibare. Bi-bɩɩg a ye n paam zu-noogo, tɩ Wẽnnaam ning-a barka, t’a sɩng tolbo, n daad ki, bɛnga, la kood buud toor-toore, n paas ne rũm-bãoonego, n leebdẽ, tɩ sɩd tar barka.

La, yʋʋm piig loogr poore, a arzɛkã sɩd fɩɩga sõma. La rao wã, sẽn da tar sulg-m-meng yĩnga, kɩtame, tɩ nebã ra waoogd-a. Ra yaa ned me, sẽn da get a roagdbã yell sõma. La, nebã wa n sɩngame, n yet rao wã: «Haya! fo sã n ka gilim n bao kogl-m-menga, f bɛɛbã na n kʋ-f lame, wala b sãam f paoongã ».

La rẽ tɛka, rao wã pa le tõe n gũs ye. Tɩ bala, a ra tara tagsg wʋsg a mengã ne a paoongã yĩnga. T’a na n dɩk yellã, n togs a zoa a yembre. La, a zoa wã, yãag-a-la tɩɩm soab nengẽ, n tɩ ta n togs a zu-loɛɛgã. La tɩɩmã soab yeel-b lame :

«Yãmb sẽn ta ka wã, bɩ y ra le maan yɩɩr ye. Yãnd ka na n yã yãmb ye, y yellã manegame. Tɩɩm ning mam sẽn na n kõ foomã, fo sã n wa n lebg n ta yiri, bɩ f ning-a bẽerẽ, n dɩ la f tall raoodo. Ned sã n bao n na n maan foom wẽng marsã, wẽngã na n leba a soaba. La, tɩɩmã kisa fo sẽn na n kãab ned wẽnga, bala, kãabgã na n paama pidsgu, a soabã vɩɩm pʋgẽ, fo me na n paama yelle».

B sẽn sɩd reeg tɩɩmã n kuili, b sɩd tɩ maana wa a sẽn togsã. La, biigã sẽn bãng tɩ ned a to ka le tõe n maan-a wẽngã, wuk-m-meng kẽ-a lame, t’a toor ka le be ne ned a to yas ye. La, moos maana b yel-bũndi : «Lar sã n noome, a to n kɛ a saala». A tʋʋm-yoodã, la nebã kãabgã, la b paoogrã, Wẽnnaam bas-a lame, t’a paoongã sat n dabda, t’a zakã pʋga, wʋm-taab ka le be yẽ ne a pagbã sʋk ye.

Bi-bɩɩgã yõor yɩɩ koɛɛga, bala, a ka le tõe n vɩɩmde, wa a sẽn da tar ligda wakat ye. Ra lebga sũ-toogo, rɩɩbã ka le yaa sõma wa pĩnda ye. Yẽ ne a zĩnd-n-taasã, la tẽngã nebã, ra yaa beem. Rẽ wã, wuk-m-meng rolb yaa lʋɩɩse

Yoaad a yembr kibare. Rao a ye, n wa n be tẽng a yembr pʋgẽ. La, rao wã ra nonga pagb wʋsgo. Ned bi-neere, bɩ a pʋg-neere, ka pɩʋʋgd a taoor ye. Hal tɩ saka neba, tẽngã la tẽn-yagsã fãa, wa gomd a zĩnd-n-ta-kõb-wẽndlmã yelle.

La, sẽn wa n beẽ n beẽ, kinkirg n lebg pʋg-neere, n wa rɩk-a n maan a sɩda, tɩ b be ne taaba. La, bʋdb wakat sẽn wa n ta, rao wã sã n kẽng ne a pagã, n tɩ bʋd ki wã, n lebg zaabr n kuili, pagã yikda tõd-beoog pĩnda, n tɩ bool a koden-n-taasã, tɩ b wa gaas sẽbdã n dɩ ki wã.

Rao wã sã n yik yibeoogo, n tɩ ta a pʋʋgẽ wã, a sũurã sãamda hal wʋsgo, t’a le sɩng bʋdbo. A sã n roog zaabr n kuili, vẽkembeoogo, a sã n leb n ta pʋʋgẽ wã, a mikdame, tɩ bʋd-bogdã fãa le gaasame. Talla woto, tɩ rao wã, ka paam ki yʋʋm-kãng ye. La, yʋʋmd ning sẽn pʋgdã, b le kẽng n tɩ bʋdame, la b lebg n kuili.
Vẽkembeoogo, rao wã sẽn le kẽng pʋʋgẽ wã, a yãame tɩ kodensã le wa n gaasa bʋd-bogdã fãa tẽma, n dɩ ki wã. La, tãoos a yembre, n wa n na n pʋge, n gũus n gese.
Tõd-beoog sẽn wa n ta, kodensã le tũu taab wʋsgo, n wa gaasd ki wã. La, tãoosã maaga a menga, n lall n kelgd-b goamã. La, pʋʋgã soab pag yeela a taabã : «Rũnda, d rɩ, la d kell m sɩd m ba Tẽedba.»

Tãoosã sẽn wʋm dẽ, a loogame, n tɩ togs pagã sɩd kibarã. Daar a yembre, rao wã ne a pagã wa n bee pʋʋgẽ wã n bʋtẽ, la b tar sõasga. Rao wã yeelame : «Wa tɩ d rɩ, la d kell m ba sɩd a Tẽedba.» T’a pagã yeel-a, t’a ra le saag n gom woto ye, tɩ yaa yẽ kisgu.
B sẽn ta yiri, wa tar sõasg yasa, rao wã le yeelame : «Wa tɩ d rɩ, la d kell m sɩda m ba Tẽedba.» Pagã bãngame, tɩ rao wã wʋma bãmb sõasgã.
La, a wa n menmame, tɩ rao wã ka bãnge, a sẽn teesẽ n ye. Rẽ tɛka, m ba Tẽedb basa pagb roobo. Rẽ wã yĩnga, zʋgd buud fãa, tara a rolbo.

Nin-kẽem a yembr kibare. Nin-kẽem a yembr n wa n yik a zak pʋgẽ, n na n tɩ gõ weoogẽ. La, a bi-bilf a yembr yikame, t’a na n tũ-a lame. La, a ba wã tõdgame, t’a kõn tũ ye. Tɩ bõe? A paoodame, weoogã pʋg yaa gõose, koom kae me, n yũud ye. La, a biigã tõdgame, n tũ-a n looge.
B sẽn wa n ta we-raoogã pʋga, saag n kʋɩ, tɩ sebgã sɩng yikri. B zoe n tɩ kẽe tãng bokẽ, n na n sool saagã. Mik bokã yaa m ba Weoognaab roogo.

M ba Weoognaab sẽn wa n yi gõob n wa, a mikame t’a roogã pida ne rɩɩbo, t’a na n kɩdem ne sũ-noogo, n pʋd yɩɩll n yetẽ : «Roog vũuda, roog vũuda, roog vũud tɩ m meng be yɩng n daeeda». Tɩ biigã leok-a : «M pa sablem naaba, m pa zẽenem naaba, sã n pa beoogo, tõnd pa kuus ye.»

M ba Weoognaab sẽn wʋm dẽ, a kɩdmame, n zoe n maan wa kɩlomɛtr a yiibu. Wakat-kãnga, la biigã yeel a ba wã : «Yik tao-tao n dɩk yir sore». La nin-kẽemã yiime, t’a sũurã tar kiu, kiu, la a yetẽ : «Weoognaab ye n da seg maam sorã zug ye ». La, m ba Weoognaab lebg n waame, n le sɩng yɩɩl n yetẽ : «Roog vũuda, roog vũuda, roog vũud tɩ m meng be yɩng n gõodẽ.»
Tɩ biigã leok-a yasa : «M pa sablem naaba, m pa zẽenem naaba, sã n pa beoogo, tõnd pa kuus ye ».

Sũ-noogã yĩnga, a Weoognaab sɩnga kɩdengo, la zoees yasa, n na n gilme. Tɩ biigã tũnug m ba Weoognaab loogrã, n yi n dɩk sor n zoe n kuili. M ba Weoognaab sẽn wa n lebg n wa, a ra tẽedame t’a rɩɩbã ketame, t’a le sɩng yɩɩla, la ned ba a ye pa leokd-a ye.
T’a kolg n na n lɩk n gese, la ned ba a ye ka be ye. T’a kẽng ka, n leb ka, a pa yãnd ned ye . La, a rɩka sorã, n na n bao rao wã ne a biigã. La, wakat-kãng tɩ b taa yiri.
Yaa woto, la biigã maan n fãag a ba wã, la a menga. Bɩ d ra kɩɩs d kambã noor wakat ning ye, d mi n kelgd-ba.

M ba Soaamb ne m ba Katre kibare. M ba Soaamb da mi n kẽnd n tãooda ware, ne m ba Wobgo. La wakat fãa, a Soaamb basdame, tɩ m ba Wobg kʋʋd-a. Bala, a Wobg sã n kʋ-a, a laadame, n bas a yẽdgã tɩ yaage, tɩ m ba Soaamb kẽedẽ, n tõsda a nemdã n kuiis ne, tɩ kõt a pagã, t’a rʋgd tɩ b wãbdẽ.

Daar a ye, m ba Katr pagã, wa n na n moka bugum, a Soaamb zakẽ wã, tɩ b yãk nemdã n kõ-a. La, m ba Katr pagã kẽname, n ta sorã zugu, n wãb nemdã fãa la a rʋʋd rʋʋd-koom, n kiis bugmã, n lebg n wa n na n mok bugmã yasa.

La, b sã n kõ-a, a sã n le ta sorẽ wã, a wãbda nemdã yasa, la, a rʋʋd n kiis bugmã n lebg n wa. A sẽn wa wãb n tɩg marsã, la, a yaool n na n zã nemdã, n kuil n tɩ kõ a sɩda. M ba Katr me, sẽn lemb n mik tɩ ya noogã, a maka gõeem n kong n yik n sok a pagã: «Ãnd n kõ foo nemdã?»

La pagã yeelame, tɩ yaa m ba Soaamba. M ba Katr sãda yibeoog pĩnda, n tɩ sok m ba Soaamba : «Fo maanda wãn-wãn to-to, n paamd nemdã wʋsg woto, n wãbd tɩ sekd-fo, la f tõe n yãk n kõ f taaba?» Tɩ m ba Soaamb yeel-a : «Kuil la f wa beoogo, tɩ d kẽng n tɩ bao».

Katr sãda yibeoog pĩnda, n wa nek m ba a Soaamba, tɩ b na n kẽng n tɩ tão ware, ne m ba Wobgo. La, m ba Soaamb sẽn le wa n ta, a sɩd basda a meng wakat fãa, tɩ m ba Wogb tãood warã, n kʋʋd-a. La, b sẽn tar tãoob n tar tãoobo, m ba Soaamb le wa n bas a menga, tɩ m ba Wobg kʋ-a, n bas n la, n yaag a yẽdgã woo…!

T’a Soaamb ne a Katr yɩk n kẽ. La, m ba Soaamb yeela m ba Katre : «Da tõsg sũurã kaamã ye. Da mak n sɩɩs yamã me ye ». B sẽn wa n tar nemdã wõrsgo, m ba a Katr zoe-bõn soabã, kẽngame n tɩ wõrg sũurã, tɩ m ba Wobg ki, t’a yẽdgã page. B sẽn ka le tõe n yi wã yĩnga, m ba Soaamb kẽe pʋ-bilã pʋgẽ n solge. M ba Katr me, kẽe pʋ-bedrã pʋgẽ n solge.

La we-gõodb n wa n yã a Wobg sẽn n ki n dɩga, tɩ b vu-a n kẽes tɩɩg maasem tẽngre, n na n pase. B sẽn wa n pas-a n sa, b kõo biig pʋ-bilã, t’a tɩ lob bok pʋga. Biigã sɩd rɩka pʋʋrã, n na n tɩ lobe. A sẽn wa n kolg bokã, la, m ba Soaamb sẽn da be pʋ-bilã pʋgẽ wã, yeel-a : «Da lob yambẽ n ka ye, sãag n kẽng taoore».

Tɩ biigã loog n dabd taoore, n na n tɩ lob-a begdẽ. T’a le yeel-a : «Sãag taoor yasa». Tɩ biigã sɩd be ne-a taoor sãagre, n tɩ ta zĩ-peel pʋgẽ, n fãeeg-a be. La, m ba Soaamb yɩɩ tao-tao n pãrg pʋ-bilã n yi purss…n lebg n wa ta, n yeele : «Yãmb ka ne pʋ-bedrã ?

Ned kam fãa rɩk raoogo, n wa wẽ-a, tɩ d ges bõe n be be ». La ned kam fãa sɩd baoo raoog n wa. La, m ba Soaamb kõo noore, tɩ b naag taab n wẽ pʋʋrã. La, m ba Katr zĩnda pʋgẽ wã, n kelem wii…! La, a kiime.
B yaool n pãrga pʋʋrã, n dɩk a Katr n maneg n paas a wobg nemdã, n pas n pʋɩ taaba, n kuil n tɩ rʋge. Rẽ yĩnga, ka f nin sẽn ne fãa, la f rɩt ye. D mi n deeg saglse.
M ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katre kibare. M ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katr wa n zemsa taaba, n tuk bɛng pʋʋg ned kam fãa, n na n ko. La, sẽoog sẽn wa n ta, b fãa tɩ bʋdame, ne b zak rãmba.

Bɛngã womb wakat sẽn wa n ta, m ba Katr rẽ wã, maana puud sõma, n dat n wome, n yɩɩd m ba Soaamb rẽndã. La m ba Soaamb sẽn yã rẽ, a talla sũ-kĩiri, ne m ba Katre, a bɛngã yĩnga. A kẽngame, n tɩ yã m ba Katre, n yeel-a :
«Wa tɩ d kẽnge, n tɩ pãb d bɛnsã puudã n sʋʋge, rẽ, b womda saal-saala, bɛd-bɛda, wogd-wogdo.» La, a Katr sakame, tɩ b kẽnge, n tɩ pãb a rẽ wã puudã, n sʋʋge.

La daar ning b sẽn segd n tɩ pãbe, m ba a Soaamb bɛngã puudã n sʋʋge, m ba Soaamb yika yibeoog pĩndã, n kẽng n tɩ solg sorã noore, piding poore. M ba Katr sẽn wa n loogdẽ, m ba Soaamb yɩɩ purss… n yi, tɩ, m ba Katr yaeese, n lebg n zoe n kuili.

La, m ba Soaamb le yɩɩ tao-tao, n deng m ba Katr yiri. A Katr sẽn wa n ta n yã m ba Soaamb a zakẽ wã, a yeel-a lame : «Mam da rabda weoogẽ wã, tɩ bũmb tek n dig maam, tɩ tõnd mao ne taaba, t’a sã bĩndu.» La, m ba Soaamb yeelame, tɩ sã n yaa woto, a na n baoo tɩɩm, n were, n tɩ yuglg bĩndã, tɩ sẽn sã-a bĩndã, ki ».
Tɩ, m ba Katr yeel-a : «Fo sã n na n tɩ yuglgi, bɩ f yuglg bilf-bilfu, tɩ tõnd fãa bĩndã kalma taaba.» Zãag f meng ne sũ-kĩir soaba, n paam tɩ f paoong yalse, n fɩɩg n tall barka.

Nem-koaas a ye kibare. Nem-koaas a ye n wa n da naafo. La, a yãka yam, n yeel t’a ka na n kʋ naafã zõaag sẽn be zĩig ning ye. La a yikame, n na n kẽn n kẽ we-raoog pʋgẽ ne naafã, n na n bao zĩig ning zõaag sẽn ka be, n kʋ-a.

La, a bi-bilf yikame, t’a na n tũ-a lame, la, a ba wã tõdgame. La biigã baoo tompeglem n ning a ba wã korgã pʋgẽ, n yaool n poog võ-bil korgã tẽngre, t’a ba wã sã n na n looge, bɩ a tõog n tũ tompeglmã vũkã, n pʋg-a.

Rao wã sɩd wa n yikame, n dɩk a korgã n bobe, n pid a naafã wĩiri, n tat n kẽed weoogã. La, a biigã yikame, n get tompeglmã, n pʋgd a ba wã. A ba wã wa n wẽnegame, n yã biigã t’a pʋgd-a. A ka le tõe n yeel biigã t'a lebg n kuil ye. Bala, b zoe n bee weoogã sʋka. La, b naaga taab n tar kẽna marsã.

La rao wã yeela a biigã t’a sã bĩndu. La biigã sãame tɩ zõosã wa. Tɩ rao wã yet tɩ naafã kʋʋb zĩig pa ka ye. Tɩ b le tar kẽn n tar kẽna. A le wa n yeela a biigã t’a sã, tɩ biigã sɩd sã, la zõosã yɩɩ wãa… n wa. La rao wã yeelame, tɩ naafã kʋʋb zĩig nan ka ta ye. Tɩ b sɩd be taoor sãagre. A le wa n yeela a biigã t’a sã, tɩ biigã sã, tɩ zõos ka wa ye, t’a yeele, tɩ marsã, naafã kʋʋb zĩig taame.

B loee naafã n lub n kodg-a ne sʋʋga. Rao wã yaool n tʋma biigã, t’a kẽng n tɩ mok bugum, n wa tɩ b sẽ naafã sãoore. Biigã kẽngame n na n mok bugmã, n tɩ mik tɩ bugmã soab yaa kinkirga, la a sokame : «Ãnda n wa n kogsd m yẽdga ?». Tɩ biigã leoke : «Yaa m ba n tʋm maam, tɩ m wa mok bugum n wa t’a sẽ sãoore ” Tɩ kinkirgã sok-a : «M sã n wa, m na n paamame bɩ ?».

La biigã leok-a lame : «N-yẽe !» Kinkirgã sẽn kẽng n tɩ ta b zĩigẽ wã, a yeel-b lame : «Rɩk-y pʋ-teedã n wa ne». Tɩ b rɩk n kõ-a t’a reeg n vole. N le yeel-ba : «Wa-y ne gɛyã ne bãgdã». Tɩ b kõ-a t’a reeg n vole. N le yeel-b yasa : «M data zugã ne gãongã n paase». Tɩ b rɩk n kõ-a, la b na n zoe.

B zoe n tɩ kẽe roog a ye pʋg n na n solge. Mik, roogã yaa kinkirgã roogo. A sẽn wa n ta, a maaga a meng n wʋb nemdã fãa laag pʋgẽ, n yaool n dɩk a sag-rʋk n na n moe sagbo. A sẽn wa n moe n sa, a rɩka laagã ne rɩɩbã, n bĩng a poorẽ wã.

La biigã ne a ba wã sẽn da solg pĩirã poorẽ wã, rɩka rɩɩbã n dɩ tɩ yɩ-b noogo, hal tɩ zẽedã wa sa. Nemdã yĩnga, zẽedã sɩd yɩɩ noog tɩ looge. Biigã yikame n na n bõos zẽedã. T’a ba wã yɩ tao-tao n yeel-a, t’a ra mak, tɩ kinkirgã na n kʋ-b lame.
Tɩ biigã zĩẽ n zĩẽ, n wa kelme, n yeele : «Pʋg-yãanga, m kota zẽedo!» La kinkirgã yikame, n wudg n tɩ tigim we-rũmsã fãa n yeel tɩ : «pʋg-yãang-m-kota-zẽed n be m doogẽ wã, n dat n kʋ maam».

We-rũmsã fãa wa n naaga taab n wa gũbg roogã, n na n gese. B yaool n tʋma m ba Yõngr t’a tɩ ges bõe n be roogã pʋgẽ. La m ba Yõngr sẽn wa n tar lamsg n dabd n na n gese, la biigã sẽn yã-a, n wẽ-a n kʋ.
Tɩ b yeel m ba Yũug t’a kolg n gese. T’a kolg n yaees n lebge. Tɩ b le yeele, tɩ m ba Rãaneg kolg marsã, n ges tɩ yẽ yubl n woagem la!
T’a sɩd yɩ gond-gond n kolge, tɩ biigã fiuuga a yublã ne sʋʋga. Tɩ m ba Rãaneg tar po-tulli, n tɩ rok n lʋɩ zʋko! Lebga yelle.
Tɩ m ba Yʋgempend yet tɩ bõe la wã? Tɩ m ba Wobg rãmb zoe bilf-bilfu, tɩ bãmb ra wa lʋɩ b nao-bogd pʋsẽ, n pa tõog n yi ye.
Rẽ wã, ned fãa sã n na n saag n mak, n maan bũmbu, bɩ a mag wʋsg la a kos saglgo, sã n pa rẽ, a sẽn na n maanã, wat n tõe n wa nafa ned a to n bas-a.
Tãoos a yembre kibare. Tãoos n wa n tɩ ti tãoos roogo, koom noore, n gũusd we-rũmsã, sẽn wat n yũud koomã, n tãoodẽ. La, daar a ye, a wa n kẽnga zĩigẽ wã, n na n tɩ tãoose.

La, a wa n zẽka a nenga, n yã kinkirga, sẽn zĩ n sõt a ligdi. T’a sok a menga : «M tãood-a lame n kʋ, la m sig n tɩ rɩk a ligdã bɩ? » Tɩ kinkirgã gir a zugu. : «Bɩ, m na n tɩ sõng-a lame, n sõd a ligdã, t’a yãk n kõ-ma?» Tɩ, kinkirgã gõms a zugu.
Rao wã kẽngme tɩ sõnga kinkirgã, n sõd a ligdã n sa. La, kinkirgã yãka ligdã, n kõ-a, t’a tõdge, n yet t’a ka rat ye, tɩ yẽ sẽn datã, ya a bãngrã. La, kinkirgã yeela rao wã :
«Fo ka tõe n zã bãngrã ye.» La, rao wã yeelame, t’a tõeeme. Kinkirgã sɩd mak n kongame, n kõ-a nug-bĩnga, la, a yeel-a, t’a ra wa saag n togs ned ye, bala, a na n kiime.

Tãoosã pag me, ra yaa nin-feoogo. Daar a ye, a pagã wa n da werda ki neerẽ, tɩ noos wa rat n dɩ ki wã. La, no-raoog a ye, n yeela no-yãanga, t’a leb pagã goabg nif sẽn ka ne wã sẽnẽ, n liib pagã, t’a peng ki wã ne wamdã, n lub tɩ b paam n dɩ. Tɩ, tãoosã zĩẽ n kelgdẽ.

No-yãangã, sɩd leba pagã nug-goabgã, n liib-a t’a peng ki wã tɩ rʋʋge, tɩ b sɩd rɩ. La, pagã sɩd ra zĩime, n tar laado. La, pagã soka a sɩdã, a laadã võore, t’a sɩdã yet tɩ ka bũmb ye. (Bala, a sã n togse, a na n kiime). La, pagã yeelame, t’a sã n ka wilg-a, a laadã võore, yẽ na n wʋka a teed n kuili, a ba-yir tɩ sa.

Rao wã makame, n kong n togs-a. Dẽ poore, rao wã kiime. La, tẽngã rãmb tuu kabre, n na n mum-a. T’a zoa a ye, tõdge, n deeg kũumã, n dɩk-a, n kẽ weoogã, n bao zĩig n bĩng-a, n yaool n bao zĩig n solge, n get kũumã. La, dʋgr-bila, n wa n ta, n na n dɩ-a. A sẽn kolg n gok kũumã, la, a sẽn rok n lʋɩ, n ki.

La, dʋgr naab wa n taame, n yãk tɩɩm ne zʋʋre, a korgã pʋgẽ n sɩɩs dʋgr-bilã, n yaool n yeel-a : «Fo sã n mi n yã rɩɩbo, bɩ f bas tɩ dʋgr naab goke, tɩ fo yaool n goke. Fo sã n mi n yã rɩɩbo, bɩ f bas tɩ dʋgr naab gok tɩ fo yaool n goke. Fo sã n mi n yã rɩɩbo, bɩ f bas tɩ dʋgr naab gok tɩ fo yaool n goke.»
Naoor a tã, tɩ dʋgrã vʋʋge. Dʋgr naabã, kẽngame marsã, n tɩ ta, n na n dɩ kũumã. La, rao wã, yɩɩ tao-tao, n kẽng n tɩ rɩk zʋʋrã, n tɩ pĩng kũumã n yeele :

«Fo sã n mi n wʋm gomde, reng n togs f zoa, la f yaool n togs f paga. Fo sã n mi n wʋm gomde, reng n togs f zoa, la f yaool n togs f paga. Fo sã n mi n wʋm gomde, reng n togs f zoa, la f yaool n togs f paga.» Naoor a tã, tɩ kũumã tĩsi, n vʋʋge. Rẽ wã, yam dɩkda, f to nengẽ

Pag a yembr kibare. Pag a ye, n wa n be tẽng a yembr pʋgẽ. La, a ra yaa sũ-kĩ-neda, la zoe-bõn soaba, n le yaa wagdre. A pʋg-taabã la yagsã teed sã n menme, sã n tar-n-tarẽ, yaa pagã nengẽ, la b yãt teedã. Hal, tɩ sakã neb fãa, wa gomd a yelle.
Kãang a yembr me, n be tẽngã sʋka, t’a raadã pa wɩɩsd ye. La, pagã wa n yika daar a yembre, n tɩ wɩɩs kãangã raado. Kãangã zĩnã yɩkame, n zõd pagã, n yet t’a rũng-a poor n kuili.

Tɩ pagã sɩd make, n kong n buk-a, n ta yiri, n yalse, n yeel-a : «Sig tɩ m lub m raado, t’a tõdge, sig tɩ m moe sagbo, t’a tõdge, tɩ pagã rũng-a n tar-a n gilimd ne zakã, la a tar yãbre, tɩ sakã nebã fãa, wa gũbg-a, n getẽ.
La, zĩnã basame, t’a nams sõma, t’a yaool n wa yeel-a : «Rɩk raadã n tɩ lebs kãangã pʋgẽ tao-tao, sã n ka rẽ, mam ka na n bas-f ye».
La, pagã sɩd talla raadã n tɩ lebs kãangã pʋgẽ, n na n paam a menga. Rẽ wã yĩnga, sẽn kisa, sɩd kisame. Sẽn ka maande, sɩd ka maand ye.
So-taogd a ye kibare. Ned a ye, n wa n na n tog sore. La, a sẽn wa n kolg tẽngã sẽn pa yɩɩd wakat a yiib kẽnde, la a tudg sorã.
T’a gõodẽ n baood tẽngã sorã n kongdẽ, hal tɩ ko-yũud la kom wa tar-a. La, a wa n kẽn n tɩ mika rao sẽn zĩ sor noore. Mik, rao wã sẽn zĩ wã, yaa gãeenga, la so-toagdã ra ka mi ye.
T’a pʋʋse, tɩ gãeengã leok-a. Tɩ rao wã sok-a : «Mam tudga Dõosẽ tẽngã sor n dat tɩ y wilg-ma ». La gãeenga yeel-a lame : «Fo pa ne toɛɛgã sẽn be taoorã sɩda ? » Tɩ rao wã leoke : «N-yẽ! ”
Tɩ gãeengã yeel-a : «Fo sã n tɩ loog toɛɛgã, n ta taoor bilfu, bɩ f wẽneg n kẽ f yẽdgẽ wã, tɩ Dõosẽ sor la be ». Fo zab ne gãeenga, pa tar yõodo, fo sĩnd f noor me, sũ-toogo.

M ba Soaamb ne m ba Katre kibare. M ba Soaamba, ne m ba Katr wa n yii gõobo. La, m ba Soaamb ra reng n baoo ka-zẽeg zug n ning a waoog pʋga. B sẽn wa n tar kẽna, b tɩ yãa bõnyẽeg kamb a yiibu, n dɩk-ba n sui b waoos pʋsẽ.

La, m ba Soaamb yeela a Katre : «D kao bõnyẽegã kamb zutu». La, Katr sɩd yɩɩ tao-tao, n kaoog a rẽ wã zugu. La, m ba Soaamb tʋmame, n kaoog ka-zẽegã zugu tɩ sak põra, tɩ m ba Katr tẽ, tɩ yaa sɩda. B wa n kẽname, n tɩ seg m ba Bõnyẽega, t’a sok-ba : «Yãmb ka yã mam kambã?»

Tɩ m ba Soaamb leok-a : «D yã-b lame ». T’a bõnyẽeg yeel-ba : «Wa-y ne-ba! ». Tɩ m ba Soaamb yɩ tao-tao, n wõog a rẽndã n kõ. «La foom»? T’a Katr wõog a rẽ wã n mik t’a kiime. La, a yɩɩ tao-tao n yeele : «A laada, a laada ». T’a bõnyẽeg be m ba a Katr rigbu. Tɩ m ba Soaamb lamsd n pʋgda. La, a Katr wa n zoe, n tɩ kẽe yaoor bokẽ. T’a bõnyẽeg ne a Soaamb na n tu bokã.

B sẽn wa n tar bokã tuubu, n wa kolg m ba Katre, b baoo yamsem ne tɩpare, n to, n puus a Katr bokã pʋga. La, m ba Katr me, zĩnda boka pʋga, n kok n lebs n puus-ba. T’a bõnyẽeg kok n lembe, n bas n yeel m ba Soaamba :
«Ad Katrã fulfuldã noomame dɛ»! Tɩ m ba Soaamb leok-a : «Bas rẽ, a sãoorã noom n yɩɩda». Rẽ wã, bɩ gũus-y, tɩ nina manesem, yaa tudgr manesem, sẽn na bao yell n dogl yãmba.
Luiilã ra kẽng n tɩ yãnda yõngrã; yõngrã yãnga a no-kõbdã la a yãlsa wila.
Ka-sãnd-sõng ka tat zɛɛgẽ ye. (Yel-bũndi: Zu-noog bũmb sã n wa, f kokdame baa tɩ f ka bũmbã soaba.)
B yalsa yĩngr n ka yẽrg hal n tɩ tãag a vẽk-m-beoogã.
Nin-kẽem kaagd n kaoogd a sag-wãre. (Yel-bũndi:F sã n kaag neda, a soabã na n pʋɩ ne foo a sẽn tarã n wilg a zaamẽbeoog ne foo.)
A ra vɩɩ kaanẽ n wa kẽ kãadem.
A loe maam tɩ m mao n fãag m menga.
Y kabse, la b na pak tɩ y kẽ.
Tɩ pʋ-peelem sã n kaẽ, ned ka toẽ n yã wẽnd ye.
Bas wil-kãngã la f toeem a to.
«La buudã fãa na n waa yãmb taoor n wa waoog yãmba, yãmb bʋʋdã kaoob sẽn yɩ vẽeneg ne nebã fãa wã yĩnga.»
Pa so miuusg, pa kaoogd sʋk ye. (Yel-bũndi:D da led ned sẽn na n kẽes a meng yɛl pʋg ye.)
Pesg kaoosg la lomde. Yel-bũndi [zems-n-taaga: zĩm-bil na n lebga bedre]
A kãaba bi-puglã tɩ Wẽnd na kõ-a sɩd-sõngo.
Rɩt yɩng ka be kãabg ye. Yel-bũndi
Ning-y neb nins sẽn kãabd yãmb wẽngã zut barka.
Yaa raoog n kãdg mam nugã.
A wãbe zĩm tɩ kõbr kãgemd-a.
Katr sã n paam kãgr-sõngo, a pa yõkd bʋʋg ye.
Kãnkãe sã n be taoore, yol-yol n pʋgde. (Yel-bũndi: Baa ne yɛlã sẽn pak to-to fãa d ka tog n boog d tẽebã la d sɩd-kũunã tɩ fãa na n yolsame ye.
Kãnkãr ra wɩd a moog tɩ b fãa zãng yaa rʋda.
M ma kambã sʋka, maam la kãoogo.
B rɩka wamã n keedg taaba.
Liuul kelem n bool saag, la a na yoog a zugẽ. (Yel-bũndi:Ned sã n bao yelle, yẽ n na n tʋk-a baa t 'a zɩs wʋsgo.)
A rɩɩ sagbã la a kell maam mui wã.
A kell n ka wa ka?
A tʋmame tɩ b keo ga.
F tʋma sõma la kedga bilfu.
Raagã kẽeme. Neb wʋsg n be be.
Pa kẽ bãong pa kɩɩd pʋg wiy ye.
Ned fãa kẽebda a sẽn ko.
Katr yeelame t 'a sã n tẽeg a zaamẽ rɩ-kʋda, a kẽeda tẽnga ne wĩndga.
Yaa yẽ n kẽem tõnd fãa.
A naga zomã n bas tɩ kẽk t 'a maan zom koom (n na n yũ).
A kẽka maam tɩ m ka tõe n vʋʋs ye.
Kẽ n pa gõe, kẽndame tɩ zĩig yẽege. (Yel-bũnd sẽn dat n yet tɩ yell tõe n waa ne a to/ d segd n ninga pãng n yals kẽn-kẽn.)
B kɛɛda tɩɩg ning fãa sẽn ka womd bi-sõama.
Zõos silem-silemsã moka zɩɩmã, tɩ loms pãbd zãng n dẽegdẽ.
Kɛɛg-wok tara tɩɩm, la kɛɛg-koɛɛg ka tar tɩɩm ye.(Yel-bũndi: D segd n seglg n bĩngame, n da wa seg yɛl d tʋʋmã wakat ye.)
Kɛɛg-wok tara tɩɩm, la kɛɛg-koɛɛg ka tar tɩɩm ye.
Kɛma a yiib sãgs n noome. (Yel-bũndi: Y sã n waoogẽ rẽ n noom n yɩɩd fo sẽn ya f yembre.
Pa ta kʋɩlg n yõng koom kiida ko-yũudu.
La b rag n ka tar biig ye. Bala, a Elizabɛt da yaa kiiri.
Tɩɩm pa sat killẽ ye. (Yel-bũndi: Ned ka segd n sak tɩ bũmb sẽn tar yõod ne-a menem ye hal n tɩ tãag a yẽgr wã. A sõmb zãa bũmb ning sẽn tõe sõng-a t 'a maan a sẽn tarã neere.)
A tõe n kilmame n lebg katre.
F sã n sao n kẽng taoor n ka yãnd kilsg, bɩ f ra le sao n wa poorẽ ye.
Ned sẽn nong a meng pa kis a to ye.
B kĩi ne taaba, b yaa ma-biisi.
Kɩ baafã ka n loe bʋʋgã.
Pʋg-sad na kɩdemd, bɩ a sok a pʋgdba.(Yel-bũndi : Baa ne d sũ-noog sẽn ta to-to bɩ d maan n zems tɩ d ka mi beoog ye.)
Fo na n paama sũ-noog n kɩdme.
Fo sãn ka reng n yãk kɛgbẽ gõaaga, fo ka tõe n zĩnd n yãk kargẽ gõaag ye.
Ra bas tɩ kɩɩm kẽ roog tɩ b yaool n pag ye.
Naoor sẽn kɩɩs a to la wobendo.
A wʋma yellã n wa soos n togs maam.
Da kɩs kasete zirẽ n dõd f to ye.
Koom beeme tɩ ko-sʋk beẽ.(Yel-bũndi: Yʋʋre, pãn-soolem, Arzɛka, toodo, la yel-pakre. Bãmbã fãa ka wẽnd taab ne b yõod belem ne ninsaalbã, soolemã, tẽmse, tẽn-ma-rãmbã.
Ko-zoetmã zoeeme n wẽ roogã, la a ka ttõog n miim-a ye
Nin-kẽem sã n gʋsd noaag la a yɩɩndẽ, a yãbdame.(Yel-bũndi: Neb sã n vʋɩ ne taaba, b rɩta taab yõodo.
Lʋn-koatga pa wẽed n põomdedẽ ye.(Yel-bũndi:D sã deeg ned bũmbu, d segd n zã-a-la neere n wa tɩ lebs tɩ ka sãam ye.)
Gũus f meng koe ! A ka wa koe?
Tõnd koe-zugã yaa «Pag ne a sɩd vɩɩm».
Tar gãongo, n kogsd wẽng soabã pɛɛmã fãa.
Roogẽ wã yaa tʋʋlg t 'a yi n na n kok pemsem.
B baoo barg n kok a zugã.
A Zã yõka yẽnda n sog a kokoɛy wã n yeel-a: «Yao maam m samdã.».
Pademd noor yita kolkood, pademd noor pa yit zɩɩm ye.
Noor soab ka kongd sor ye.
Tõnd pa rengd wʋʋg n lʋɩ koomẽ ye. (Yel-bũndi: D bao bũmb kaseto sẽn na yɩlẽ n kõ d meng bʋʋm la kaseto.)
Tab-noog n koosd a menga.( Yel-bũndi: bõn koosdem paamd a rãada faag-faaga)
M bõos koom (n na n yũ).
Wẽnnaam leoka pagã kodgo, la a rɩka pʋg n dog bi-ribla.
Karen-saamba, m kot-y lame tɩ y ges m bi-riblã.
Kõ n paas pa wẽ n paas ye.(Yel-bũndi: Maan-neer ka tar sekr ye, ned fãa segd n tʋmã sõama wakat fãa. Sẽn yɩɩd fãa d da sãam n baas ye.)
Kõbr zã n kaoos yooda baag yam.
A kõra zĩigã moodã tɩ lebg neere.
Sãan yao kuilb a pegde a nus ko-yũudẽ.
Yõk n lubã yaa ka pãnga, la gãe n kutẽ wã yaa f ka neda.
Gãeeng sã n dɩk f kurg / bɛnd tɩ f zoe n pʋg-a, fo me yaa gãeenga. ( Yel-bũndi: d da yɩ maan n lebs rãmb ye)
Yʋʋm a yiib biig pa belgd na a kuroog ye.
Kʋ-bil pa solgd yak ye, rɩ-bil n solgd yaka.
Zaamẽ me yaa kʋdemde.(Yel-bũndi: Zaamẽ, yaa kʋdemd sẽn yaa yambẽ, la baasg zãnga yaa kʋdemd ned ning sẽn vɩɩmd-a wã sẽn tõe n dɩk n taas a taaba.)
Yel-bũndi:Ned kam fãa zãms zu-kʋr tʋkre, tɩ ka zĩis fãa n tar kʋɩds ye.
Kʋɩɩm yet tɩ koob noom me, roog tɩ d kul n yɩɩde.
A kʋkda a zug n kelme.
Kʋɩlg bas m yam yaa kʋl-koɛɛnga.(Yel-bũndi, võore : vɩɩma ya gũusgu, y zãagd y meng ne yɛla)
Kelg yaa bõe n tar kʋr-kʋrã?
Wẽnnaam Sẽn-Ka-Saab yãka tẽng tom n naan ninsaala. La Wẽnnaam fʋʋsa ninsaal yõ-bogdã pʋga, n ning vɩɩm ninsaal pʋgẽ. La ninsaal lebga nin-vɩɩga.
F sã n pa na n rɩ la-wɛdgẽ, bɩ f ra ning n kõ f to ye. (Yel-bũnd sẽn dat n yet tɩ d sẽn ka rat tɩ d taabã maan-d bũmb ninsã, d da maan-b bõn-kãensã ye.)
Ned pa yãt pesg bedrem n lebg lagd ye. (Yel-bũndi: D ka segd n gom n faag taab la d rẽgem d mensã la d burkĩndã ye. )
Sɩlg laand yĩngr me, a kõb wata tẽnga.
Bãad kʋdr n são ne laasr kibare.(Yel-bũndi: Ned ning sẽn maana bũmb n ges tara bãngr bõn-kãng zug n tõe gom-a yelle.)
Kẽnkẽndba lagem koabga, tɩ koaadba lagem zãnga.(Yel-bũndi:Lɛɛb nafda a menga, la ka-koaad koodame n dɩlgd nebã fãa.)
Wẽnd na kõ-y yeyn-yeyn, n lagm-y lengr a ye. (Yel-bũndi: B kõo ned fãa sor t 'a maan tʋʋmd ning fãa a sẽn dat, la ned kam fãa pʋɩ a tʋʋmdã biis ne a taabã.)
A laka kugrã n võk a naoore.
Ra la f ra n kõ-ma, laok-sãoogo!
Lar sã n noomẽ, a to n kɛ a saala. (Yel-bũndi: D segd n yɩɩ sik-m-mens rãmb d manesemã fãa pʋgẽ.)
A maandame t 'a biigã rɩt sagbo.
Ned mii f kẽnd, la f pa mi f lebgr ye. (Yel-bũndi)
Bas tɩ mam led biigã zĩigẽ n pa ka.
Lek niigã tɩ b dẽeda pʋʋgẽ wã.
Ned par tõe n suk zẽed n kõ biig n par lelem a nus-bi ye.
A Zã bãngrã ne b leokdsã linga neb nins fãa sẽn da wʋmda.
Bi-bɛɛg yẽdg sã n ke} sĩ, a to n leoode.
Bulumbuk yeelame tɩ dũni yaa lib-libi.
Bakaorg yet tɩ reng n ku la lilgu.
A yũu koomã wʋsg t 'a pʋʋrã ya lɩʋʋ.
Ned pa tõe n pa yer fuug t 'a nug wa be a loaagẽ ye.
Nug pa põogd t 'a soab wõrg n lob ye.
Rẽenem gãeengã sẽn pa yã loeesã, yaoolem gãeengã me pa yãt loees ye.
Wãamb zʋʋr n loet-a. ( Yel-bũndi: ned fã ya a yell tɩɩm)
Wẽnd na n malg f tʋʋma.
La pʋg-kãngã, a Abraham yagenga, t 'a Sʋɩtãan loe-a yʋʋm piig la nii tõre, b ra ka sɛgd n lok-a sabbat wã daare ?  »
A yĩngã tolg n yaa lomde.
Koom pa longd n wãb zom ye. (Yel-bũndi:Noy sã n be y sẽn segd n tũ yaa sor b sẽn na n tũ n tõog n maan bũmbu, D segd n tũ-b-la sõma, pa rẽ d pa na n tõog n maan d sẽn datã ye.)
Yel-bũndi: Ka wat n get-ma ka yell ye, lood n gind-ma, yẽ yaa zabre.
Loog n kẽ tɩ ya f ma n be, loog n tɩ rok tɩ yaa f ma rog-tomd kae ye.
B kʋʋ bull n dɩk a fuugã, n los zɩɩmẽ wã.
Bõang sã n lub-fu, f pa yãt a tʋb ye. (Yel-bũndi: D segd n maana gũusg wʋsgo, sẽn na yɩlẽ n tõog n yã yɛl bãn nins fãa sẽn tõe sãam-b tõndã.)
Maag-m-meng soab n yũud nag-kir bĩisim.
Saagã naga tõnd tɩ d yɛs mabrga.
A maga mui wã kong a naase.
Wẽnnaam tʋma a malɛk ned a yembr nengẽ.
Bala, yaa mamsgo la mam kõ yãmba, tɩ yãmb me na maan wa mam sẽn maan yãmb.
Bala, mam miime moasã, tɩ fo zoeta Wẽnnaam.
Ned sã n paam dũni bũmb fãa, n yaool n menem wall a sãam a menga, a yõod bee yɛ ne-a?
sã n tudg sore, f tõe menmame.
Zũnzũur n da tab a nugã t 'a mesg-a t 'a lʋɩ.
Yaoor sã n vɩ, bɩ a ket n metẽ.
A kẽe karen-doogẽ wã wa a sẽn minim n maandẽ wã.
A nan ka minim tʋʋmã ye.
Sokr be mo-beedo, la a be bãngre. / Sokr la bãngre. (Yel-bũndi: D ka segd zoe wɩdgã, bɩ wẽnemã n da bao bãngrã ye. )
Yellã buud ka zĩnd hal dũni sɩngr wakat tɩ ta moasã ye.
Yʋgemd poor pa mot tɩ b wedg bõang ye.(Yel-bũndi, a võore: D ka segd n tudg bũmb tɩɩm ye.)
Ned kõn modg nin-kẽem n sui a korg zom ye.(Yel-bũndi: D ka segd n modg ned n maan-a bũmb sẽn na n yɩ sõama ne-a ye.)
Bõang a ye n mog zom tɩ pelg bõens fãa noyã.
Neb n dag n tʋk kũum n dabd mumbu.
Tak fu-goabgã n munumd f zugã ne f karsã, tɩ yaa rũmsi.
Na-kãsen-kãar pa rengd na-bi taoore ye.
N dat na-biig n doge, n yaool n pa rat n yɩ na-pag ye.
Bakaorg yet tɩ ne kam fãa rasempʋɩɩg la a na-tẽnga.(Yel-bũndi: Ned kam tall sũ-noog ne a sẽn tarã, la a zã-b neere.)
Tẽedbã fãa ra tigma taab n pʋɩt b sẽn da tarã ne taaba.
F sã n naag kamb n dɩ ka-zẽeg sagbo, b yetame tɩ f wa tɩ y tɛ sã ka-zẽeg bĩndu.
Bala, hal ba naar pʋgẽ, ninsaal vɩɩmã ka tũud ne bũmb nins a sẽn tarã ye.
La tigsgã wakate, mam na n yeela tigsdbã tɩ b reng n võ nadensã n sẽb kil n yõog bugum, la b tigs koodã n sui m baoorẽ
A kẽnga Waga n tɩ nadem n kẽng Bobo.
Tẽng kom-pugli nagda tẽng kom-dibli raabo
B kõ-a-la tʋʋmd t 'a nak n bas.
Na nams moog namsda f menga.
Nang pãng n ta Wẽnnaam yam.
Ãbg sã n kʋʋle, a basda a biig ne nao-yẽese.
Ned tũuda tũng naoor n dɩk a biiga.(Yel-bũndi: Sor sã n be sẽn na tũ n maneg yelle, d segd n tũ-a-la neere, sã n ka rẽ d ka na n tõog n paam d sẽn datã ye.)
Ne y kẽnd são ne y zĩiga.(Yel-bũnd sẽn wilgd tɩ ninsaal fãa ka segd n zĩnd zaalem ye, a segd n baoa bũmb n maane.)
Waaf yeelame tɩ ned kam fãa zomb a sẽn kõn lʋɩẽ.
Ned meta neer n zems a pag pende.(Yel-bũndi:Ned kam fãa segd n vɩɩmdame n zems a pãn-tõogo.)
Maan-y neb nins sẽn kis yãmbã neere.
Ned sẽn pa gõe nekr yaa toogo.(Yel-bũndi:Ned sã n magd t 'a miime t 'a yaool n ka mi, a sã n kɩɩsdẽ baa ne kaset nins b sẽn kõt-a wã, yaa toog tɩ b toog t 'a soabã toeem yam.)
Nen-tũudga: yaa modgr tɩ m tũ sorã neng ning pĩimã sẽn teesẽ wã.
Samd neong ka be kaam ye.(Yel-bũndi: bũmb fo sẽn paam zaalem bɩ ligdã ka toog ka tõe n yɩ sõama zãng wa bũmb ligd sẽn yaa toog ye. Nafrã ka tõe n yɩ a ye ye.)
Pʋg-tẽbdg yãa ni. (Yel-bũndi: ned sã n wa tõdg kũuni dall a paam n yɩɩd woto kɛɛnga.)
Sẽn wãbd-a noaag zug, pa zoet nif koom ye. (Yel-bũndi:D tõe maana bũmb fãa n ka yɛɛsdẽ ye, d sã n ka yɛɛsd yɛlã.)
Saag niida yaare, la koom zoeta neng-nenga.
Nin-kẽem sẽn bĩngẽ, ya a to sẽn dɩkẽ.(Yel-bũndi: Ned ka tõe n tall yam n yɩɩg neb a taabã fãa ye.)
Ni-sĩndg pʋ-toog be a yẽd-bokẽ wã.
A yaa nin-tɩrga, n zoet wẽnnaam.
Nin-vẽen-neb a yiib pa gãand taab wĩndg ye.(Yel-bũndi:Neb a yiib pʋs sã n pa peel ne taaba, bɩ b sã n ka kɩs sɩd ne taaba, b ka nan tol n viig taab wẽgb ye.)
